00038 #ifndef MeanRatioFunctions_hpp
00039 #define MeanRatioFunctions_hpp
00040 
00041 #include <math.h>
00042 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00043 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00044 #include "Matrix3D.hpp"
00045 #include "Exponent.hpp"
00046 
00047 namespace MESQUITE_NS 
00048 {
00049   /***************************************************************************/
00050   /* Gradient calculation courtesy of Paul Hovland.  The code was modified   */
00051   /* to reduce the number of flops and intermediate variables, and improve   */
00052   /* the locality of reference.                                              */
00053   /***************************************************************************/
00054   /* The Hessian calculation is computes everyting in (x,y,z) blocks and     */
00055   /* stores only the upper triangular blocks.  The results are put into      */
00056   /* (c1,c2,c3,c4) order prior to returning the Hessian matrix.              */
00057   /***************************************************************************/
00058   /* The form of the function, gradient, and Hessian follows:                */
00059   /*   o(x) = a * pow(f(A(x)), b) * pow(g(A(x)), c)                          */
00060   /* where A(x) is the incidence matrix generated by:                        */
00061   /*           [x1-x0 x2-x0 x3-x0]                                           */
00062   /*    A(x) = [y1-y0 y2-y0 y3-y0] * inv(W)                                  */
00063   /*           [z1-z0 z2-z0 z3-z0]                                           */
00064   /* and f() is the squared Frobenius norm of A(x), and g() is the           */
00065   /* determinant of A(x).                                                    */
00066   /*                                                                         */
00067   /* The gradient is calculated as follows:                                  */
00068   /*   alpha := a*b*pow(f(A(x)),b-1)*pow(g(A(x)),c)                          */
00069   /*   beta  := a*c*pow(f(A(x)),b)*pow(g(A(x)),c-1)                          */
00070   /*                                                                         */
00071   /*   do/dx = (alpha * (df/dA) + beta * (dg/dA)) (dA/dx)                    */
00072   /*                                                                         */
00073   /*   (df/dA)_i = 2*A_i                                                     */
00074   /*   (dg/dA)_i = A_j*A_k - A_l*A_m for some {j,k,l,m}                      */
00075   /*                                                                         */
00076   /*   d^2o/dx^2 = (dA/dx)' * ((d alpha/dA) * (df/dA) +                      */
00077   /*                           (d  beta/dA) * (dg/dA)                        */
00078   /*                                  alpha * (d^2f/dA^2)                    */
00079   /*                                   beta * (d^2g/dA^2)) * (dA/dx)         */
00080   /*                                                                         */
00081   /*   Note: since A(x) is a linear function, there are no terms involving   */
00082   /*   d^2A/dx^2 since this matrix is zero.                                  */
00083   /*                                                                         */
00084   /*   gamma := a*b*c*pow(f(A(x)),b-1)*pow(g(A(x)),c-1)                      */
00085   /*   delta := a*c*(c-1)*pow(f(A(x)),b)*pow(g(A(x)),c-2)                    */
00086   /*   psi   := a*b*(b-1)*pow(f(A(x)),b-2)*pow(g(A(x)),c)                    */
00087   /*                                                                         */
00088   /*   d^2o/dx^2 = (dA/dx)' * (gamma*((dg/dA)'*(df/dA) + (df/dA)'*(dg/dA)) + */
00089   /*                           delta* (dg/dA)'*(dg/dA) +                     */
00090   /*                             psi* (df/dA)'*(df/dA) +                     */
00091   /*                           alpha*(d^2f/dA^2) +                           */
00092   /*                            beta*(d^2g/dA^2)) * (dA/dx)                  */
00093   /*                                                                         */
00094   /*   Note: (df/dA) and (dg/dA) are row vectors and we only calculate the   */
00095   /*   upper triangular part of the inner matrices.                          */
00096   /*                                                                         */
00097   /*   For regular tetrahedral elements, we have the following:              */
00098   /*                                                                         */
00099   /*           [-1         1        0         0         ]                    */
00100   /*       M = [-sqrt(3)  -sqrt(3)  2*sqrt(3) 0         ]                    */
00101   /*           [-sqrt(6)  -sqrt(6)  -sqrt(6)  3*sqrt(6) ]                    */
00102   /*                                                                         */
00103   /*           [M 0 0]                                                       */
00104   /*   dA/dx = [0 M 0]                                                       */
00105   /*           [0 0 M]                                                       */
00106   /***************************************************************************/
00107 
00108 /*****************************************************************************/
00109 /* Not all compilers substitute out constants (especially the square root).  */
00110 /* Therefore, they are substituted out manually.  The values below were      */
00111 /* calculated on a solaris machine using long doubles. I believe they are    */
00112 /* accurate.                                                                 */
00113 /*****************************************************************************/
00114 
00115 #define isqrt3   5.77350269189625797959429519858e-01        /*  1.0/sqrt(3.0)*/
00116 #define tisqrt3  1.15470053837925159591885903972e+00        /*  2.0/sqrt(3.0)*/
00117 #define isqrt6   4.08248290463863052509822647505e-01        /*  1.0/sqrt(6.0)*/
00118 #define tisqrt6  1.22474487139158915752946794252e+00        /*  3.0/sqrt(6.0)*/
00119 
00120 /*****************************************************************************/
00121 /* The following set of functions reference triangular elements to an        */
00122 /* equilateral triangle in the plane defined by the normal.  They are        */
00123 /* used when assessing the quality of a triangular element.  A zero          */
00124 /* return value indicates success, while a nonzero value indicates failure.  */
00125 /*****************************************************************************/
00126 
00127 /*****************************************************************************/
00128 /* Function evaluation requires 44 flops.                                    */
00129 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1 or c == 1                               */
00130 /*****************************************************************************/
00131 inline bool m_fcn_2e(double &obj, const Vector3D x[3], const Vector3D &n,
00132                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
00133 {
00134   double matr[9], f;
00135   double g;
00136 
00137   /* Calculate M = [A*inv(W) n] */
00138   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
00139   matr[1] = (2.0*x[2][0] - x[1][0] - x[0][0])*isqrt3;
00140   matr[2] = n[0];
00141 
00142   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
00143   matr[4] = (2.0*x[2][1] - x[1][1] - x[0][1])*isqrt3;
00144   matr[5] = n[1];
00145 
00146   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
00147   matr[7] = (2.0*x[2][2] - x[1][2] - x[0][2])*isqrt3;
00148   matr[8] = n[2];
00149 
00150   /* Calculate det(M). */
00151   g = matr[0]*(matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7]) +
00152       matr[3]*(matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8]) +
00153       matr[6]*(matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4]);
00154   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
00155 
00156   /* Calculate norm(M). */
00157   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] +
00158       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] +
00159       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7];
00160 
00161   /* Calculate objective function. */
00162   obj = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
00163   return true;
00164 }
00165 
00166 /*****************************************************************************/
00167 /* Gradient evaluation requires 88 flops.                                    */
00168 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1 or c == 1                               */
00169 /*****************************************************************************/
00170 inline bool g_fcn_2e(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[3], 
00171                      const Vector3D x[3], const Vector3D &n,
00172                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
00173 {
00174   double matr[9], f;
00175   double adj_m[9], g;           // adj_m[2,5,8] not used
00176   double loc1, loc2, loc3;
00177 
00178   /* Calculate M = [A*inv(W) n] */
00179   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
00180   matr[1] = (2.0*x[2][0] - x[1][0] - x[0][0])*isqrt3;
00181   matr[2] = n[0];
00182 
00183   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
00184   matr[4] = (2.0*x[2][1] - x[1][1] - x[0][1])*isqrt3;
00185   matr[5] = n[1];
00186 
00187   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
00188   matr[7] = (2.0*x[2][2] - x[1][2] - x[0][2])*isqrt3;
00189   matr[8] = n[2];
00190 
00191   /* Calculate det([n M]). */
00192   loc1 = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
00193   loc2 = matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8];
00194   loc3 = matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4];
00195   g = matr[0]*loc1 + matr[3]*loc2 + matr[6]*loc3;
00196   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
00197 
00198   /* Calculate norm(M). */
00199   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] +
00200       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] +
00201       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7];
00202 
00203   /* Calculate objective function. */
00204   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
00205 
00206   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
00207   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
00208   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
00209   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
00210 
00211   adj_m[0] = matr[0]*f + loc1*g;
00212   adj_m[3] = matr[3]*f + loc2*g;
00213   adj_m[6] = matr[6]*f + loc3*g;
00214 
00215   loc1 = matr[0]*g;
00216   loc2 = matr[3]*g;
00217   loc3 = matr[6]*g;
00218 
00219   adj_m[1] = matr[1]*f + loc3*matr[5] - loc2*matr[8];
00220   adj_m[4] = matr[4]*f + loc1*matr[8] - loc3*matr[2];
00221   adj_m[7] = matr[7]*f + loc2*matr[2] - loc1*matr[5];
00222 
00223   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[1];
00224   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - loc1;
00225   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0] - loc1;
00226   g_obj[2][0] = 2.0*loc1;
00227 
00228   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[4];
00229   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - loc1;
00230   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3] - loc1;
00231   g_obj[2][1] = 2.0*loc1;
00232 
00233   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[7];
00234   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - loc1;
00235   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6] - loc1;
00236   g_obj[2][2] = 2.0*loc1;
00237   return true;
00238 }
00239 
00240 /*****************************************************************************/
00241 /* Hessian evaluation requires 316 flops.                                    */
00242 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1 or c == 1                               */
00243 /*****************************************************************************/
00244 inline bool h_fcn_2e(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[3], Matrix3D h_obj[6],
00245                      const Vector3D x[3], const Vector3D &n,
00246                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
00247 {
00248   double matr[9], f;
00249   double adj_m[9], g;           // adj_m[2,5,8] not used
00250   double dg[9];                 // dg[2,5,8] not used
00251   double loc0, loc1, loc2, loc3, loc4;
00252   double A[12], J_A[6], J_B[9], J_C[9], cross;  // only 2x2 corners used
00253 
00254   /* Calculate M = [A*inv(W) n] */
00255   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
00256   matr[1] = (2.0*x[2][0] - x[1][0] - x[0][0])*isqrt3;
00257   matr[2] = n[0];
00258 
00259   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
00260   matr[4] = (2.0*x[2][1] - x[1][1] - x[0][1])*isqrt3;
00261   matr[5] = n[1];
00262 
00263   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
00264   matr[7] = (2.0*x[2][2] - x[1][2] - x[0][2])*isqrt3;
00265   matr[8] = n[2];
00266 
00267   /* Calculate det([n M]). */
00268   dg[0] = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
00269   dg[3] = matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8];
00270   dg[6] = matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4];
00271   g = matr[0]*dg[0] + matr[3]*dg[3] + matr[6]*dg[6];
00272   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
00273 
00274   /* Calculate norm(M). */
00275   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] +
00276       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] +
00277       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7];
00278 
00279   loc3 = f;
00280   loc4 = g;
00281 
00282   /* Calculate objective function. */
00283   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
00284 
00285   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
00286   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
00287   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
00288   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
00289 
00290   dg[1] = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
00291   dg[4] = matr[0]*matr[8] - matr[2]*matr[6];
00292   dg[7] = matr[2]*matr[3] - matr[0]*matr[5];
00293 
00294   adj_m[0] = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*g;
00295   adj_m[1] = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*g;
00296   adj_m[3] = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*g;
00297   adj_m[4] = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*g;
00298   adj_m[6] = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*g;
00299   adj_m[7] = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*g;
00300 
00301   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[1];
00302   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - loc1;
00303   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0] - loc1;
00304   g_obj[2][0] = 2.0*loc1;
00305 
00306   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[4];
00307   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - loc1;
00308   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3] - loc1;
00309   g_obj[2][1] = 2.0*loc1;
00310 
00311   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[7];
00312   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - loc1;
00313   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6] - loc1;
00314   g_obj[2][2] = 2.0*loc1;
00315 
00316   /* Calculate the hessian of the objective.                   */
00317   loc0 = f;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 f       */
00318   loc1 = g;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 g       */
00319   cross = f * c.value() / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla f */
00320   f = f * (b.value()-1) / loc3;         /* Constant on nabla f nabla f */
00321   g = g * (c.value()-1) / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla g */
00322   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f    */
00323 
00324   /* First block of rows */
00325   loc3 = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*cross;
00326   loc4 = dg[0]*g + matr[0]*cross;
00327 
00328   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[0] + loc4*dg[0];
00329   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
00330   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
00331   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
00332   J_C[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00333   J_C[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00334 
00335   loc3 = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*cross;
00336   loc4 = dg[1]*g + matr[1]*cross;
00337 
00338   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
00339   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
00340   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
00341   J_C[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00342   J_C[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00343 
00344   /* First diagonal block */
00345   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[1];
00346   A[0] = -J_A[0] - loc2;
00347   A[1] =  J_A[0] - loc2;
00348 
00349   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[3];
00350   A[4] = -J_A[1] - loc2;
00351   A[5] =  J_A[1] - loc2;
00352   A[6] = 2.0*loc2;
00353 
00354   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
00355   h_obj[0][0][0] = -A[0] - loc2;
00356   h_obj[1][0][0] =  A[0] - loc2;
00357   h_obj[2][0][0] = 2.0*loc2;
00358 
00359   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
00360   h_obj[3][0][0] = A[1] - loc2;
00361   h_obj[4][0][0] = 2.0*loc2;
00362 
00363   h_obj[5][0][0] = tisqrt3*A[6];
00364 
00365   /* First off-diagonal block */
00366   loc2 = matr[8]*loc1;
00367   J_B[1] += loc2;
00368   J_B[3] -= loc2;
00369 
00370   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[3];
00371   A[0] = -J_B[0] - loc2;
00372   A[1] =  J_B[0] - loc2;
00373   A[2] = 2.0*loc2;
00374 
00375   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[4];
00376   A[4] = -J_B[1] - loc2;
00377   A[5] =  J_B[1] - loc2;
00378   A[6] = 2.0*loc2;
00379 
00380   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
00381   h_obj[0][0][1] = -A[0] - loc2;
00382   h_obj[1][0][1] =  A[0] - loc2;
00383   h_obj[2][0][1] = 2.0*loc2;
00384 
00385   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
00386   h_obj[1][1][0] = -A[1] - loc2;
00387   h_obj[3][0][1] =  A[1] - loc2;
00388   h_obj[4][0][1] = 2.0*loc2;
00389 
00390   loc2 = isqrt3*A[6];
00391   h_obj[2][1][0] = -A[2] - loc2;
00392   h_obj[4][1][0] =  A[2] - loc2;
00393   h_obj[5][0][1] = 2.0*loc2;
00394 
00395   /* Second off-diagonal block */
00396   loc2 = matr[5]*loc1;
00397   J_C[1] -= loc2;
00398   J_C[3] += loc2;
00399 
00400   loc2 = isqrt3*J_C[3];
00401   A[0] = -J_C[0] - loc2;
00402   A[1] =  J_C[0] - loc2;
00403   A[2] = 2.0*loc2;
00404 
00405   loc2 = isqrt3*J_C[4];
00406   A[4] = -J_C[1] - loc2;
00407   A[5] =  J_C[1] - loc2;
00408   A[6] = 2.0*loc2;
00409 
00410   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
00411   h_obj[0][0][2] = -A[0] - loc2;
00412   h_obj[1][0][2] =  A[0] - loc2;
00413   h_obj[2][0][2] = 2.0*loc2;
00414 
00415   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
00416   h_obj[1][2][0] = -A[1] - loc2;
00417   h_obj[3][0][2] =  A[1] - loc2;
00418   h_obj[4][0][2] = 2.0*loc2;
00419 
00420   loc2 = isqrt3*A[6];
00421   h_obj[2][2][0] = -A[2] - loc2;
00422   h_obj[4][2][0] =  A[2] - loc2;
00423   h_obj[5][0][2] = 2.0*loc2;
00424 
00425   /* Second block of rows */
00426   loc3 = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*cross;
00427   loc4 = dg[3]*g + matr[3]*cross;
00428 
00429   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
00430   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
00431   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00432   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00433 
00434   loc3 = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*cross;
00435   loc4 = dg[4]*g + matr[4]*cross;
00436 
00437   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
00438   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00439   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00440 
00441   /* Second diagonal block */
00442   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[1];
00443   A[0] = -J_A[0] - loc2;
00444   A[1] =  J_A[0] - loc2;
00445 
00446   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[3];
00447   A[4] = -J_A[1] - loc2;
00448   A[5] =  J_A[1] - loc2;
00449   A[6] = 2.0*loc2;
00450 
00451   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
00452   h_obj[0][1][1] = -A[0] - loc2;
00453   h_obj[1][1][1] =  A[0] - loc2;
00454   h_obj[2][1][1] = 2.0*loc2;
00455 
00456   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
00457   h_obj[3][1][1] = A[1] - loc2;
00458   h_obj[4][1][1] = 2.0*loc2;
00459 
00460   h_obj[5][1][1] = tisqrt3*A[6];
00461 
00462   /* Third off-diagonal block */
00463   loc2 = matr[2]*loc1;
00464   J_B[1] += loc2;
00465   J_B[3] -= loc2;
00466 
00467   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[3];
00468   A[0] = -J_B[0] - loc2;
00469   A[1] =  J_B[0] - loc2;
00470   A[2] = 2.0*loc2;
00471 
00472   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[4];
00473   A[4] = -J_B[1] - loc2;
00474   A[5] =  J_B[1] - loc2;
00475   A[6] = 2.0*loc2;
00476 
00477   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
00478   h_obj[0][1][2] = -A[0] - loc2;
00479   h_obj[1][1][2] =  A[0] - loc2;
00480   h_obj[2][1][2] = 2.0*loc2;
00481 
00482   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
00483   h_obj[1][2][1] = -A[1] - loc2;
00484   h_obj[3][1][2] =  A[1] - loc2;
00485   h_obj[4][1][2] = 2.0*loc2;
00486 
00487   loc2 = isqrt3*A[6];
00488   h_obj[2][2][1] = -A[2] - loc2;
00489   h_obj[4][2][1] =  A[2] - loc2;
00490   h_obj[5][1][2] = 2.0*loc2;
00491 
00492   /* Third block of rows */
00493   loc3 = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*cross;
00494   loc4 = dg[6]*g + matr[6]*cross;
00495 
00496   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00497   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00498 
00499   loc3 = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*cross;
00500   loc4 = dg[7]*g + matr[7]*cross;
00501 
00502   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00503 
00504   /* Third diagonal block */
00505   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[1];
00506   A[0] = -J_A[0] - loc2;
00507   A[1] =  J_A[0] - loc2;
00508 
00509   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[3];
00510   A[4] = -J_A[1] - loc2;
00511   A[5] =  J_A[1] - loc2;
00512   A[6] = 2.0*loc2;
00513 
00514   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
00515   h_obj[0][2][2] = -A[0] - loc2;
00516   h_obj[1][2][2] =  A[0] - loc2;
00517   h_obj[2][2][2] = 2.0*loc2;
00518 
00519   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
00520   h_obj[3][2][2] = A[1] - loc2;
00521   h_obj[4][2][2] = 2.0*loc2;
00522 
00523   h_obj[5][2][2] = tisqrt3*A[6];
00524 
00525   // completes diagonal blocks.
00526   h_obj[0].fill_lower_triangle();
00527   h_obj[3].fill_lower_triangle();
00528   h_obj[5].fill_lower_triangle();
00529   return true;
00530 }
00531 
00532 /*****************************************************************************/
00533 /* The following set of functions reference triangular elements to an        */
00534 /* right triangle in the plane defined by the normal.  They are used when    */
00535 /* assessing the quality of a quadrilateral elements.  A zero return value   */
00536 /* indicates success, while a nonzero value indicates failure.               */
00537 /*****************************************************************************/
00538 
00539 /*****************************************************************************/
00540 /* Function evaluation -- requires 41 flops.                                 */
00541 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1, c == 1, or d == 1                      */
00542 /*****************************************************************************/
00543 inline bool m_fcn_2i(double &obj, const Vector3D x[3], const Vector3D &n,
00544                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c,
00545                      const Vector3D &d)
00546 {
00547   double matr[9];
00548   double f;
00549   double g;
00550 
00551   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
00552   matr[0] = d[0]*(x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
00553   matr[1] = d[1]*(x[2][0] - x[0][0]);
00554   matr[2] = n[0];
00555 
00556   matr[3] = d[0]*(x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
00557   matr[4] = d[1]*(x[2][1] - x[0][1]);
00558   matr[5] = n[1];
00559 
00560   matr[6] = d[0]*(x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
00561   matr[7] = d[1]*(x[2][2] - x[0][2]);
00562   matr[8] = n[2];
00563 
00564   /* Calculate det(M). */
00565   g = matr[0]*(matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7]) +
00566       matr[3]*(matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8]) +
00567       matr[6]*(matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4]);
00568   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
00569 
00570   /* Calculate norm(M). */
00571   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] +
00572       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] +
00573       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7];
00574 
00575   /* Calculate objective function. */
00576   obj = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
00577   return true;
00578 }
00579 
00580 /*****************************************************************************/
00581 /* Gradient requires 82 flops.                                               */
00582 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1, c == 1, or d == 1                      */
00583 /*****************************************************************************/
00584 inline bool g_fcn_2i(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[3], 
00585                      const Vector3D x[3], const Vector3D &n,
00586                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c,
00587                      const Vector3D &d)
00588 {
00589   double matr[9], f;
00590   double adj_m[9], g;            // adj_m[2,5,8] not used
00591   double loc1, loc2, loc3;
00592 
00593   /* Calculate M = [A*inv(W) n] */
00594   matr[0] = d[0]*(x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
00595   matr[1] = d[1]*(x[2][0] - x[0][0]);
00596   matr[2] = n[0];
00597 
00598   matr[3] = d[0]*(x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
00599   matr[4] = d[1]*(x[2][1] - x[0][1]);
00600   matr[5] = n[1];
00601 
00602   matr[6] = d[0]*(x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
00603   matr[7] = d[1]*(x[2][2] - x[0][2]);
00604   matr[8] = n[2];
00605 
00606   /* Calculate det([n M]). */
00607   loc1 = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
00608   loc2 = matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8];
00609   loc3 = matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4];
00610   g = matr[0]*loc1 + matr[3]*loc2 + matr[6]*loc3;
00611   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
00612 
00613   /* Calculate norm(M). */
00614   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] +
00615       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] +
00616       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7];
00617 
00618   /* Calculate objective function. */
00619   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
00620 
00621   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
00622   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
00623   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
00624   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
00625 
00626   adj_m[0] = d[0]*(matr[0]*f + loc1*g);
00627   adj_m[3] = d[0]*(matr[3]*f + loc2*g);
00628   adj_m[6] = d[0]*(matr[6]*f + loc3*g);
00629 
00630   loc1 = matr[0]*g;
00631   loc2 = matr[3]*g;
00632   loc3 = matr[6]*g;
00633 
00634   adj_m[1] = d[1]*(matr[1]*f + loc3*matr[5] - loc2*matr[8]);
00635   adj_m[4] = d[1]*(matr[4]*f + loc1*matr[8] - loc3*matr[2]);
00636   adj_m[7] = d[1]*(matr[7]*f + loc2*matr[2] - loc1*matr[5]);
00637 
00638   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - adj_m[1];
00639   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0];
00640   g_obj[2][0] =  adj_m[1];
00641 
00642   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - adj_m[4];
00643   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3];
00644   g_obj[2][1] =  adj_m[4];
00645 
00646   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - adj_m[7];
00647   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6];
00648   g_obj[2][2] =  adj_m[7];
00649   return true;
00650 }
00651 
00652 /*****************************************************************************/
00653 /* Hessian requires 253 flops.                                               */
00654 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1, c == 1, or d == 1                      */
00655 /*****************************************************************************/
00656 inline bool h_fcn_2i(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[3], Matrix3D h_obj[6],
00657                      const Vector3D x[3], const Vector3D &n,
00658                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c,
00659                      const Vector3D &d)
00660 {
00661   double matr[9], f;
00662   double adj_m[9], g;           // adj_m[2,5,8] not used
00663   double dg[9];                 // dg[2,5,8] not used
00664   double loc0, loc1, loc2, loc3, loc4;
00665   double A[12], J_A[6], J_B[9], J_C[9], cross;  // only 2x2 corners used
00666 
00667   const double scale[3] = {
00668     d[0]*d[0], d[0]*d[1],
00669                d[1]*d[1]
00670   };
00671 
00672   /* Calculate M = [A*inv(W) n] */
00673   matr[0] = d[0]*(x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
00674   matr[1] = d[1]*(x[2][0] - x[0][0]);
00675   matr[2] = n[0];
00676 
00677   matr[3] = d[0]*(x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
00678   matr[4] = d[1]*(x[2][1] - x[0][1]);
00679   matr[5] = n[1];
00680 
00681   matr[6] = d[0]*(x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
00682   matr[7] = d[1]*(x[2][2] - x[0][2]);
00683   matr[8] = n[2];
00684 
00685   /* Calculate det([n M]). */
00686   dg[0] = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
00687   dg[3] = matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8];
00688   dg[6] = matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4];
00689   g = matr[0]*dg[0] + matr[3]*dg[3] + matr[6]*dg[6];
00690   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
00691 
00692   /* Calculate norm(M). */
00693   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] +
00694       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] +
00695       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7];
00696 
00697   loc3 = f;
00698   loc4 = g;
00699 
00700   /* Calculate objective function. */
00701   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
00702 
00703   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
00704   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
00705   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
00706   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
00707 
00708   dg[1] = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
00709   dg[4] = matr[0]*matr[8] - matr[2]*matr[6];
00710   dg[7] = matr[2]*matr[3] - matr[0]*matr[5];
00711 
00712   adj_m[0] = d[0]*(matr[0]*f + dg[0]*g);
00713   adj_m[1] = d[1]*(matr[1]*f + dg[1]*g);
00714   adj_m[3] = d[0]*(matr[3]*f + dg[3]*g);
00715   adj_m[4] = d[1]*(matr[4]*f + dg[4]*g);
00716   adj_m[6] = d[0]*(matr[6]*f + dg[6]*g);
00717   adj_m[7] = d[1]*(matr[7]*f + dg[7]*g);
00718 
00719   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - adj_m[1];
00720   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0];
00721   g_obj[2][0] =  adj_m[1];
00722 
00723   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - adj_m[4];
00724   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3];
00725   g_obj[2][1] =  adj_m[4];
00726 
00727   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - adj_m[7];
00728   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6];
00729   g_obj[2][2] =  adj_m[7];
00730 
00731   /* Calculate the hessian of the objective.                   */
00732   loc0 = f;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 f       */
00733   loc1 = g;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 g       */
00734   cross = f * c.value() / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla f */
00735   f = f * (b.value()-1) / loc3;         /* Constant on nabla f nabla f */
00736   g = g * (c.value()-1) / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla g */
00737   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f    */
00738 
00739   /* First block of rows */
00740   loc3 = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*cross;
00741   loc4 = dg[0]*g + matr[0]*cross;
00742 
00743   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[0] + loc4*dg[0];
00744   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
00745   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
00746   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
00747   J_C[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00748   J_C[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00749 
00750   loc3 = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*cross;
00751   loc4 = dg[1]*g + matr[1]*cross;
00752 
00753   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
00754   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
00755   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
00756   J_C[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00757   J_C[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00758 
00759   /* First diagonal block */
00760   J_A[0] *= scale[0];
00761   J_A[1] *= scale[1];
00762   J_A[3] *= scale[2];
00763 
00764   A[0] = -J_A[0] - J_A[1];
00765   A[4] = -J_A[1] - J_A[3];
00766 
00767   h_obj[0][0][0] = -A[0] - A[4];
00768   h_obj[1][0][0] =  A[0];
00769   h_obj[2][0][0] =  A[4];
00770 
00771   h_obj[3][0][0] = J_A[0];
00772   h_obj[4][0][0] = J_A[1];
00773 
00774   h_obj[5][0][0] = J_A[3];
00775 
00776   /* First off-diagonal block */
00777   loc2 = matr[8]*loc1;
00778   J_B[1] += loc2;
00779   J_B[3] -= loc2;
00780 
00781   J_B[0] *= scale[0];
00782   J_B[1] *= scale[1];
00783   J_B[3] *= scale[1];
00784   J_B[4] *= scale[2];
00785 
00786   A[0] = -J_B[0] - J_B[3];
00787   A[4] = -J_B[1] - J_B[4];
00788 
00789   h_obj[0][0][1] = -A[0] - A[4];
00790   h_obj[1][0][1] =  A[0];
00791   h_obj[2][0][1] =  A[4];
00792 
00793   h_obj[1][1][0] = -J_B[0] - J_B[1];
00794   h_obj[3][0][1] =  J_B[0];
00795   h_obj[4][0][1] =  J_B[1];
00796 
00797   h_obj[2][1][0] = -J_B[3] - J_B[4];
00798   h_obj[4][1][0] =  J_B[3];
00799   h_obj[5][0][1] =  J_B[4];
00800 
00801   /* Second off-diagonal block */
00802   loc2 = matr[5]*loc1;
00803   J_C[1] -= loc2;
00804   J_C[3] += loc2;
00805 
00806   J_C[0] *= scale[0];
00807   J_C[1] *= scale[1];
00808   J_C[3] *= scale[1];
00809   J_C[4] *= scale[2];
00810 
00811   A[0] = -J_C[0] - J_C[3];
00812   A[4] = -J_C[1] - J_C[4];
00813 
00814   h_obj[0][0][2] = -A[0] - A[4];
00815   h_obj[1][0][2] =  A[0];
00816   h_obj[2][0][2] =  A[4];
00817 
00818   h_obj[1][2][0] = -J_C[0] - J_C[1];
00819   h_obj[3][0][2] =  J_C[0];
00820   h_obj[4][0][2] =  J_C[1];
00821 
00822   h_obj[2][2][0] = -J_C[3] - J_C[4];
00823   h_obj[4][2][0] =  J_C[3];
00824   h_obj[5][0][2] =  J_C[4];
00825 
00826   /* Second block of rows */
00827   loc3 = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*cross;
00828   loc4 = dg[3]*g + matr[3]*cross;
00829 
00830   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
00831   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
00832   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00833   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00834 
00835   loc3 = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*cross;
00836   loc4 = dg[4]*g + matr[4]*cross;
00837 
00838   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
00839   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00840   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00841 
00842   /* Second diagonal block */
00843   J_A[0] *= scale[0];
00844   J_A[1] *= scale[1];
00845   J_A[3] *= scale[2];
00846 
00847   A[0] = -J_A[0] - J_A[1];
00848   A[4] = -J_A[1] - J_A[3];
00849 
00850   h_obj[0][1][1] = -A[0] - A[4];
00851   h_obj[1][1][1] =  A[0];
00852   h_obj[2][1][1] =  A[4];
00853 
00854   h_obj[3][1][1] = J_A[0];
00855   h_obj[4][1][1] = J_A[1];
00856 
00857   h_obj[5][1][1] = J_A[3];
00858 
00859   /* Third off-diagonal block */
00860   loc2 = matr[2]*loc1;
00861   J_B[1] += loc2;
00862   J_B[3] -= loc2;
00863 
00864   J_B[0] *= scale[0];
00865   J_B[1] *= scale[1];
00866   J_B[3] *= scale[1];
00867   J_B[4] *= scale[2];
00868 
00869   A[0] = -J_B[0] - J_B[3];
00870   A[4] = -J_B[1] - J_B[4];
00871 
00872   h_obj[0][1][2] = -A[0] - A[4];
00873   h_obj[1][1][2] =  A[0];
00874   h_obj[2][1][2] =  A[4];
00875 
00876   h_obj[1][2][1] = -J_B[0] - J_B[1];
00877   h_obj[3][1][2] =  J_B[0];
00878   h_obj[4][1][2] =  J_B[1];
00879 
00880   h_obj[2][2][1] = -J_B[3] - J_B[4];
00881   h_obj[4][2][1] =  J_B[3];
00882   h_obj[5][1][2] =  J_B[4];
00883 
00884   /* Third block of rows */
00885   loc3 = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*cross;
00886   loc4 = dg[6]*g + matr[6]*cross;
00887 
00888   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
00889   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00890 
00891   loc3 = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*cross;
00892   loc4 = dg[7]*g + matr[7]*cross;
00893 
00894   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
00895 
00896   /* Third diagonal block */
00897   J_A[0] *= scale[0];
00898   J_A[1] *= scale[1];
00899   J_A[3] *= scale[2];
00900 
00901   A[0] = -J_A[0] - J_A[1];
00902   A[4] = -J_A[1] - J_A[3];
00903 
00904   h_obj[0][2][2] = -A[0] - A[4];
00905   h_obj[1][2][2] =  A[0];
00906   h_obj[2][2][2] =  A[4];
00907 
00908   h_obj[3][2][2] = J_A[0];
00909   h_obj[4][2][2] = J_A[1];
00910 
00911   h_obj[5][2][2] = J_A[3];
00912 
00913   // completes diagonal blocks.
00914   h_obj[0].fill_lower_triangle();
00915   h_obj[3].fill_lower_triangle();
00916   h_obj[5].fill_lower_triangle();
00917   return true;
00918 }
00919 
00920 /*****************************************************************************/
00921 /* The following set of functions reference tetrahedral elements to a        */
00922 /* regular tetrahedron.  They are used when assessing the quality of a       */
00923 /* tetrahedral element.  A zero return value indicates success, while        */
00924 /* a nonzero value indicates failure.                                        */
00925 /*****************************************************************************/
00926 
00927 /*****************************************************************************/
00928 /* Function evaluation requires 62 flops.                                    */
00929 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1 or c == 1                               */
00930 /*****************************************************************************/
00931 inline bool m_fcn_3e(double &obj, const Vector3D x[4],
00932                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
00933 {
00934   double matr[9], f;
00935   double g;
00936 
00937   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
00938   f       = x[1][0] + x[0][0];
00939   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
00940   matr[1] = (2.0*x[2][0] - f)*isqrt3;
00941   matr[2] = (3.0*x[3][0] - x[2][0] - f)*isqrt6;
00942 
00943   f       = x[1][1] + x[0][1];
00944   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
00945   matr[4] = (2.0*x[2][1] - f)*isqrt3;
00946   matr[5] = (3.0*x[3][1] - x[2][1] - f)*isqrt6;
00947 
00948   f       = x[1][2] + x[0][2];
00949   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
00950   matr[7] = (2.0*x[2][2] - f)*isqrt3;
00951   matr[8] = (3.0*x[3][2] - x[2][2] - f)*isqrt6;
00952 
00953   /* Calculate det(M). */
00954   g = matr[0]*(matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7]) +
00955       matr[1]*(matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8]) +
00956       matr[2]*(matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6]);
00957   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
00958 
00959   /* Calculate norm(M). */
00960   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] +
00961       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
00962       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
00963 
00964   /* Calculate objective function. */
00965   obj = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
00966   return true;
00967 }
00968 
00969 /*****************************************************************************/
00970 /* Gradient evaluation requires 133 flops.                                   */
00971 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1 or c == 1                               */
00972 /*****************************************************************************/
00973 inline bool g_fcn_3e(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[4], const Vector3D x[4],
00974                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
00975 {
00976   double matr[9], f;
00977   double adj_m[9], g;
00978   double loc1, loc2, loc3;
00979 
00980   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
00981   f       = x[1][0] + x[0][0];
00982   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
00983   matr[1] = (2.0*x[2][0] - f)*isqrt3;
00984   matr[2] = (3.0*x[3][0] - x[2][0] - f)*isqrt6;
00985 
00986   f       = x[1][1] + x[0][1];
00987   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
00988   matr[4] = (2.0*x[2][1] - f)*isqrt3;
00989   matr[5] = (3.0*x[3][1] - x[2][1] - f)*isqrt6;
00990 
00991   f       = x[1][2] + x[0][2];
00992   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
00993   matr[7] = (2.0*x[2][2] - f)*isqrt3;
00994   matr[8] = (3.0*x[3][2] - x[2][2] - f)*isqrt6;
00995 
00996   /* Calculate det(M). */
00997   loc1 = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
00998   loc2 = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
00999   loc3 = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
01000   g = matr[0]*loc1 + matr[1]*loc2 + matr[2]*loc3;
01001   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
01002 
01003   /* Calculate norm(M). */
01004   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] +
01005       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
01006       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
01007 
01008   /* Calculate objective function. */
01009   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
01010 
01011   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
01012   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
01013   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
01014   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
01015 
01016   adj_m[0] = matr[0]*f + loc1*g;
01017   adj_m[1] = matr[1]*f + loc2*g;
01018   adj_m[2] = matr[2]*f + loc3*g;
01019 
01020   loc1 = matr[0]*g;
01021   loc2 = matr[1]*g;
01022   loc3 = matr[2]*g;
01023 
01024   adj_m[3] = matr[3]*f + loc3*matr[7] - loc2*matr[8];
01025   adj_m[4] = matr[4]*f + loc1*matr[8] - loc3*matr[6];
01026   adj_m[5] = matr[5]*f + loc2*matr[6] - loc1*matr[7];
01027 
01028   adj_m[6] = matr[6]*f + loc2*matr[5] - loc3*matr[4];
01029   adj_m[7] = matr[7]*f + loc3*matr[3] - loc1*matr[5];
01030   adj_m[8] = matr[8]*f + loc1*matr[4] - loc2*matr[3];
01031 
01032   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[1];
01033   loc2 = isqrt6*adj_m[2];
01034   loc3 = loc1 + loc2;
01035   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - loc3;
01036   g_obj[1][0] = adj_m[0] - loc3;
01037   g_obj[2][0] = 2.0*loc1 - loc2;
01038   g_obj[3][0] = 3.0*loc2;
01039 
01040   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[4];
01041   loc2 = isqrt6*adj_m[5];
01042   loc3 = loc1 + loc2;
01043   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - loc3;
01044   g_obj[1][1] = adj_m[3] - loc3;
01045   g_obj[2][1] = 2.0*loc1 - loc2;
01046   g_obj[3][1] = 3.0*loc2;
01047 
01048   loc1 = isqrt3*adj_m[7];
01049   loc2 = isqrt6*adj_m[8];
01050   loc3 = loc1 + loc2;
01051   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - loc3;
01052   g_obj[1][2] = adj_m[6] - loc3;
01053   g_obj[2][2] = 2.0*loc1 - loc2;
01054   g_obj[3][2] = 3.0*loc2;
01055   return true;
01056 }
01057 
01058 /*****************************************************************************/
01059 /* Hessian evaluation requires 634 flops.                                    */
01060 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1 or c == 1                               */
01061 /*****************************************************************************/
01062 inline bool h_fcn_3e(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[4], Matrix3D h_obj[10], 
01063                      const Vector3D x[4],
01064                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01065 {
01066   double matr[9], f;
01067   double adj_m[9], g;
01068   double dg[9], loc0, loc1, loc2, loc3, loc4;
01069   double A[12], J_A[6], J_B[9], J_C[9], cross;
01070 
01071   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
01072   f       = x[1][0] + x[0][0];
01073   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
01074   matr[1] = (2.0*x[2][0] - f)*isqrt3;
01075   matr[2] = (3.0*x[3][0] - x[2][0] - f)*isqrt6;
01076 
01077   f       = x[1][1] + x[0][1];
01078   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
01079   matr[4] = (2.0*x[2][1] - f)*isqrt3;
01080   matr[5] = (3.0*x[3][1] - x[2][1] - f)*isqrt6;
01081 
01082   f       = x[1][2] + x[0][2];
01083   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
01084   matr[7] = (2.0*x[2][2] - f)*isqrt3;
01085   matr[8] = (3.0*x[3][2] - x[2][2] - f)*isqrt6;
01086 
01087   /* Calculate det(M). */
01088   dg[0] = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
01089   dg[1] = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
01090   dg[2] = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
01091   g = matr[0]*dg[0] + matr[1]*dg[1] + matr[2]*dg[2];
01092   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
01093 
01094   /* Calculate norm(M). */
01095   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] + 
01096       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
01097       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
01098 
01099   loc3 = f;
01100   loc4 = g;
01101 
01102   /* Calculate objective function. */
01103   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
01104 
01105   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
01106   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
01107   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
01108   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
01109 
01110   dg[3] = matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8];
01111   dg[4] = matr[0]*matr[8] - matr[2]*matr[6];
01112   dg[5] = matr[1]*matr[6] - matr[0]*matr[7];
01113   dg[6] = matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4];
01114   dg[7] = matr[2]*matr[3] - matr[0]*matr[5];
01115   dg[8] = matr[0]*matr[4] - matr[1]*matr[3];
01116 
01117   adj_m[0] = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*g;
01118   adj_m[1] = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*g;
01119   adj_m[2] = matr[2]*f + dg[2]*g;
01120   adj_m[3] = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*g;
01121   adj_m[4] = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*g;
01122   adj_m[5] = matr[5]*f + dg[5]*g;
01123   adj_m[6] = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*g;
01124   adj_m[7] = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*g;
01125   adj_m[8] = matr[8]*f + dg[8]*g;
01126 
01127   loc0 = isqrt3*adj_m[1];
01128   loc1 = isqrt6*adj_m[2];
01129   loc2 = loc0 + loc1;
01130   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - loc2;
01131   g_obj[1][0] = adj_m[0] - loc2;
01132   g_obj[2][0] = 2.0*loc0 - loc1;
01133   g_obj[3][0] = 3.0*loc1;
01134 
01135   loc0 = isqrt3*adj_m[4];
01136   loc1 = isqrt6*adj_m[5];
01137   loc2 = loc0 + loc1;
01138   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - loc2;
01139   g_obj[1][1] = adj_m[3] - loc2;
01140   g_obj[2][1] = 2.0*loc0 - loc1;
01141   g_obj[3][1] = 3.0*loc1;
01142 
01143   loc0 = isqrt3*adj_m[7];
01144   loc1 = isqrt6*adj_m[8];
01145   loc2 = loc0 + loc1;
01146   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - loc2;
01147   g_obj[1][2] = adj_m[6] - loc2;
01148   g_obj[2][2] = 2.0*loc0 - loc1;
01149   g_obj[3][2] = 3.0*loc1;
01150 
01151   /* Calculate the hessian of the objective.                   */
01152   loc0 = f;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 f       */
01153   loc1 = g;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 g       */
01154   cross = f * c.value() / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla f */
01155   f = f * (b.value()-1) / loc3;         /* Constant on nabla f nabla f */
01156   g = g * (c.value()-1) / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla g */
01157   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f    */
01158 
01159   /* First block of rows */
01160   loc3 = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*cross;
01161   loc4 = dg[0]*g + matr[0]*cross;
01162 
01163   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[0] + loc4*dg[0];
01164   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
01165   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
01166   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
01167   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
01168   J_B[2] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
01169   J_C[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
01170   J_C[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
01171   J_C[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01172 
01173   loc3 = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*cross;
01174   loc4 = dg[1]*g + matr[1]*cross;
01175 
01176   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
01177   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
01178   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
01179   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
01180   J_B[5] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
01181   J_C[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
01182   J_C[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
01183   J_C[5] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01184 
01185   loc3 = matr[2]*f + dg[2]*cross;
01186   loc4 = dg[2]*g + matr[2]*cross;
01187 
01188   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
01189   J_B[6] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
01190   J_B[7] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
01191   J_B[8] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
01192   J_C[6] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
01193   J_C[7] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
01194   J_C[8] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01195 
01196   /* First diagonal block */
01197   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[1];
01198   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[2];
01199   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01200 
01201   A[0] = -J_A[0] - loc4;
01202   A[1] =  J_A[0] - loc4;
01203 
01204   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[3];
01205   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[4];
01206   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01207 
01208   A[4] = -J_A[1] - loc4;
01209   A[5] =  J_A[1] - loc4;
01210   A[6] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01211 
01212   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[4];
01213   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[5];
01214   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01215 
01216   A[8] = -J_A[2] - loc4;
01217   A[9] =  J_A[2] - loc4;
01218   A[10] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01219   A[11] = 3.0*loc3;
01220 
01221   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
01222   loc3 = isqrt6*A[8];
01223   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01224 
01225   h_obj[0][0][0] = -A[0] - loc4;
01226   h_obj[1][0][0] =  A[0] - loc4;
01227   h_obj[2][0][0] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01228   h_obj[3][0][0] = 3.0*loc3;
01229 
01230   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
01231   loc3 = isqrt6*A[9];
01232 
01233   h_obj[4][0][0] = A[1] - loc2 - loc3;
01234   h_obj[5][0][0] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01235   h_obj[6][0][0] = 3.0*loc3;
01236 
01237   loc3 = isqrt6*A[10];
01238   h_obj[7][0][0] = tisqrt3*A[6] - loc3;
01239   h_obj[8][0][0] = 3.0*loc3;
01240 
01241   h_obj[9][0][0] = tisqrt6*A[11];
01242 
01243   /* First off-diagonal block */
01244   loc2 = matr[8]*loc1;
01245   J_B[1] += loc2;
01246   J_B[3] -= loc2;
01247 
01248   loc2 = matr[7]*loc1;
01249   J_B[2] -= loc2;
01250   J_B[6] += loc2;
01251 
01252   loc2 = matr[6]*loc1;
01253   J_B[5] += loc2;
01254   J_B[7] -= loc2;
01255 
01256   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[3];
01257   loc3 = isqrt6*J_B[6];
01258   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01259 
01260   A[0] = -J_B[0] - loc4;
01261   A[1] =  J_B[0] - loc4;
01262   A[2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01263   A[3] = 3.0*loc3;
01264 
01265   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[4];
01266   loc3 = isqrt6*J_B[7];
01267   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01268 
01269   A[4] = -J_B[1] - loc4;
01270   A[5] =  J_B[1] - loc4;
01271   A[6] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01272   A[7] = 3.0*loc3;
01273 
01274   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[5];
01275   loc3 = isqrt6*J_B[8];
01276   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01277 
01278   A[8] = -J_B[2] - loc4;
01279   A[9] =  J_B[2] - loc4;
01280   A[10] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01281   A[11] = 3.0*loc3;
01282 
01283   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
01284   loc3 = isqrt6*A[8];
01285   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01286 
01287   h_obj[0][0][1] = -A[0] - loc4;
01288   h_obj[1][0][1] =  A[0] - loc4;
01289   h_obj[2][0][1] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01290   h_obj[3][0][1] = 3.0*loc3;
01291 
01292   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
01293   loc3 = isqrt6*A[9];
01294   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01295 
01296   h_obj[1][1][0] = -A[1] - loc4;
01297   h_obj[4][0][1] =  A[1] - loc4;
01298   h_obj[5][0][1] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01299   h_obj[6][0][1] = 3.0*loc3;
01300 
01301   loc2 = isqrt3*A[6];
01302   loc3 = isqrt6*A[10];
01303   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01304 
01305   h_obj[2][1][0] = -A[2] - loc4;
01306   h_obj[5][1][0] =  A[2] - loc4;
01307   h_obj[7][0][1] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01308   h_obj[8][0][1] = 3.0*loc3;
01309 
01310   loc2 = isqrt3*A[7];
01311   loc3 = isqrt6*A[11];
01312   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01313 
01314   h_obj[3][1][0] = -A[3] - loc4;
01315   h_obj[6][1][0] =  A[3] - loc4;
01316   h_obj[8][1][0] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01317   h_obj[9][0][1] = 3.0*loc3;
01318 
01319   /* Second off-diagonal block */
01320   loc2 = matr[5]*loc1;
01321   J_C[1] -= loc2;
01322   J_C[3] += loc2;
01323 
01324   loc2 = matr[4]*loc1;
01325   J_C[2] += loc2;
01326   J_C[6] -= loc2;
01327 
01328   loc2 = matr[3]*loc1;
01329   J_C[5] -= loc2;
01330   J_C[7] += loc2;
01331 
01332   loc2 = isqrt3*J_C[3];
01333   loc3 = isqrt6*J_C[6];
01334   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01335 
01336   A[0] = -J_C[0] - loc4;
01337   A[1] =  J_C[0] - loc4;
01338   A[2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01339   A[3] = 3.0*loc3;
01340 
01341   loc2 = isqrt3*J_C[4];
01342   loc3 = isqrt6*J_C[7];
01343   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01344 
01345   A[4] = -J_C[1] - loc4;
01346   A[5] =  J_C[1] - loc4;
01347   A[6] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01348   A[7] = 3.0*loc3;
01349 
01350   loc2 = isqrt3*J_C[5];
01351   loc3 = isqrt6*J_C[8];
01352   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01353 
01354   A[8] = -J_C[2] - loc4;
01355   A[9] =  J_C[2] - loc4;
01356   A[10] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01357   A[11] = 3.0*loc3;
01358 
01359   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
01360   loc3 = isqrt6*A[8];
01361   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01362 
01363   h_obj[0][0][2] = -A[0] - loc4;
01364   h_obj[1][0][2] =  A[0] - loc4;
01365   h_obj[2][0][2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01366   h_obj[3][0][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01367 
01368   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
01369   loc3 = isqrt6*A[9];
01370   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01371 
01372   h_obj[1][2][0] = -A[1] - loc4;
01373   h_obj[4][0][2] =  A[1] - loc4;
01374   h_obj[5][0][2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01375   h_obj[6][0][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01376 
01377   loc2 = isqrt3*A[6];
01378   loc3 = isqrt6*A[10];
01379   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01380 
01381   h_obj[2][2][0] = -A[2] - loc4;
01382   h_obj[5][2][0] =  A[2] - loc4;
01383   h_obj[7][0][2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01384   h_obj[8][0][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01385 
01386   loc2 = isqrt3*A[7];
01387   loc3 = isqrt6*A[11];
01388   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01389 
01390   h_obj[3][2][0] = -A[3] - loc4;
01391   h_obj[6][2][0] =  A[3] - loc4;
01392   h_obj[8][2][0] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01393   h_obj[9][0][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01394 
01395   /* Second block of rows */
01396   loc3 = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*cross;
01397   loc4 = dg[3]*g + matr[3]*cross;
01398 
01399   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
01400   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
01401   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
01402   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
01403   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
01404   J_B[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01405 
01406   loc3 = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*cross;
01407   loc4 = dg[4]*g + matr[4]*cross;
01408 
01409   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
01410   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
01411   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
01412   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
01413   J_B[5] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01414 
01415   loc3 = matr[5]*f + dg[5]*cross;
01416   loc4 = dg[5]*g + matr[5]*cross;
01417 
01418   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
01419   J_B[6] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
01420   J_B[7] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
01421   J_B[8] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01422 
01423   /* Second diagonal block */
01424   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[1];
01425   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[2];
01426   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01427 
01428   A[0] = -J_A[0] - loc4;
01429   A[1] =  J_A[0] - loc4;
01430 
01431   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[3];
01432   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[4];
01433   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01434 
01435   A[4] = -J_A[1] - loc4;
01436   A[5] =  J_A[1] - loc4;
01437   A[6] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01438 
01439   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[4];
01440   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[5];
01441   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01442 
01443   A[8] = -J_A[2] - loc4;
01444   A[9] =  J_A[2] - loc4;
01445   A[10] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01446   A[11] = 3.0*loc3;
01447 
01448   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
01449   loc3 = isqrt6*A[8];
01450   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01451 
01452   h_obj[0][1][1] = -A[0] - loc4;
01453   h_obj[1][1][1] =  A[0] - loc4;
01454   h_obj[2][1][1] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01455   h_obj[3][1][1] = 3.0*loc3;
01456 
01457   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
01458   loc3 = isqrt6*A[9];
01459 
01460   h_obj[4][1][1] = A[1] - loc2 - loc3;
01461   h_obj[5][1][1] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01462   h_obj[6][1][1] = 3.0*loc3;
01463 
01464   loc3 = isqrt6*A[10];
01465   h_obj[7][1][1] = tisqrt3*A[6] - loc3;
01466   h_obj[8][1][1] = 3.0*loc3;
01467 
01468   h_obj[9][1][1] = tisqrt6*A[11];
01469 
01470   /* Third off-diagonal block */
01471   loc2 = matr[2]*loc1;
01472   J_B[1] += loc2;
01473   J_B[3] -= loc2;
01474 
01475   loc2 = matr[1]*loc1;
01476   J_B[2] -= loc2;
01477   J_B[6] += loc2;
01478 
01479   loc2 = matr[0]*loc1;
01480   J_B[5] += loc2;
01481   J_B[7] -= loc2;
01482 
01483   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[3];
01484   loc3 = isqrt6*J_B[6];
01485   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01486 
01487   A[0] = -J_B[0] - loc4;
01488   A[1] =  J_B[0] - loc4;
01489   A[2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01490   A[3] = 3.0*loc3;
01491 
01492   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[4];
01493   loc3 = isqrt6*J_B[7];
01494   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01495 
01496   A[4] = -J_B[1] - loc4;
01497   A[5] =  J_B[1] - loc4;
01498   A[6] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01499   A[7] = 3.0*loc3;
01500 
01501   loc2 = isqrt3*J_B[5];
01502   loc3 = isqrt6*J_B[8];
01503   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01504 
01505   A[8] = -J_B[2] - loc4;
01506   A[9] =  J_B[2] - loc4;
01507   A[10] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01508   A[11] = 3.0*loc3;
01509 
01510   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
01511   loc3 = isqrt6*A[8];
01512   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01513 
01514   h_obj[0][1][2] = -A[0] - loc4;
01515   h_obj[1][1][2] =  A[0] - loc4;
01516   h_obj[2][1][2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01517   h_obj[3][1][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01518 
01519   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
01520   loc3 = isqrt6*A[9];
01521   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01522 
01523   h_obj[1][2][1] = -A[1] - loc4;
01524   h_obj[4][1][2] =  A[1] - loc4;
01525   h_obj[5][1][2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01526   h_obj[6][1][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01527 
01528   loc2 = isqrt3*A[6];
01529   loc3 = isqrt6*A[10];
01530   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01531 
01532   h_obj[2][2][1] = -A[2] - loc4;
01533   h_obj[5][2][1] =  A[2] - loc4;
01534   h_obj[7][1][2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01535   h_obj[8][1][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01536 
01537   loc2 = isqrt3*A[7];
01538   loc3 = isqrt6*A[11];
01539   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01540 
01541   h_obj[3][2][1] = -A[3] - loc4;
01542   h_obj[6][2][1] =  A[3] - loc4;
01543   h_obj[8][2][1] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01544   h_obj[9][1][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01545 
01546   /* Third block of rows */
01547   loc3 = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*cross;
01548   loc4 = dg[6]*g + matr[6]*cross;
01549 
01550   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
01551   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
01552   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01553 
01554   loc3 = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*cross;
01555   loc4 = dg[7]*g + matr[7]*cross;
01556 
01557   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
01558   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01559 
01560   loc3 = matr[8]*f + dg[8]*cross;
01561   loc4 = dg[8]*g + matr[8]*cross;
01562 
01563   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
01564 
01565   /* Third diagonal block */
01566   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[1];
01567   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[2];
01568   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01569 
01570   A[0] = -J_A[0] - loc4;
01571   A[1] =  J_A[0] - loc4;
01572 
01573   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[3];
01574   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[4];
01575   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01576 
01577   A[4] = -J_A[1] - loc4;
01578   A[5] =  J_A[1] - loc4;
01579   A[6] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01580 
01581   loc2 = isqrt3*J_A[4];
01582   loc3 = isqrt6*J_A[5];
01583   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01584 
01585   A[8] = -J_A[2] - loc4;
01586   A[9] =  J_A[2] - loc4;
01587   A[10] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01588   A[11] = 3.0*loc3;
01589 
01590   loc2 = isqrt3*A[4];
01591   loc3 = isqrt6*A[8];
01592   loc4 = loc2 + loc3;
01593 
01594   h_obj[0][2][2] = -A[0] - loc4;
01595   h_obj[1][2][2] =  A[0] - loc4;
01596   h_obj[2][2][2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01597   h_obj[3][2][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01598 
01599   loc2 = isqrt3*A[5];
01600   loc3 = isqrt6*A[9];
01601 
01602   h_obj[4][2][2] = A[1] - loc2 - loc3;
01603   h_obj[5][2][2] = 2.0*loc2 - loc3;
01604   h_obj[6][2][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01605 
01606   loc3 = isqrt6*A[10];
01607   h_obj[7][2][2] = tisqrt3*A[6] - loc3;
01608   h_obj[8][2][2] = 3.0*loc3;
01609 
01610   h_obj[9][2][2] = tisqrt6*A[11];
01611 
01612   // completes diagonal blocks.
01613   h_obj[0].fill_lower_triangle();
01614   h_obj[4].fill_lower_triangle();
01615   h_obj[7].fill_lower_triangle();
01616   h_obj[9].fill_lower_triangle();
01617   return true;
01618 }
01619 
01620 /*****************************************************************************/
01621 /* The following set of functions reference tetrahedral elements to a        */
01622 /* equilateral tetrahedron.  These functions are specialized toward          */
01623 /* obtaining the gradient and Hessian with respect to a single vertex.       */
01624 /*****************************************************************************/
01625 
01626 inline bool g_fcn_3e_v3(double &obj, Vector3D &g_obj, const Vector3D x[4],
01627                         const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01628 {
01629   double matr[9], f, g;
01630   double loc1, loc2, loc3;
01631 
01632   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
01633   f       = x[1][0] + x[0][0];
01634   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
01635   matr[1] = (2.0*x[2][0] - f)*isqrt3;
01636   matr[2] = (3.0*x[3][0] - x[2][0] - f)*isqrt6;
01637 
01638   f       = x[1][1] + x[0][1];
01639   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
01640   matr[4] = (2.0*x[2][1] - f)*isqrt3;
01641   matr[5] = (3.0*x[3][1] - x[2][1] - f)*isqrt6;
01642 
01643   f       = x[1][2] + x[0][2];
01644   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
01645   matr[7] = (2.0*x[2][2] - f)*isqrt3;
01646   matr[8] = (3.0*x[3][2] - x[2][2] - f)*isqrt6;
01647 
01648   /* Calculate det(M). */
01649   loc1 = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
01650   loc2 = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
01651   loc3 = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
01652   g = matr[0]*loc1 + matr[1]*loc2 + matr[2]*loc3;
01653   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
01654 
01655   /* Calculate norm(M). */
01656   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] +
01657       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
01658       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
01659 
01660   /* Calculate objective function. */
01661   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
01662 
01663   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
01664   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
01665   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
01666   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
01667 
01668   g_obj[0] = tisqrt6*(matr[2]*f + loc3*g);
01669 
01670   loc1 = matr[0]*g;
01671   loc2 = matr[1]*g;
01672 
01673   g_obj[1] = tisqrt6*(matr[5]*f + loc2*matr[6] - loc1*matr[7]);
01674   g_obj[2] = tisqrt6*(matr[8]*f + loc1*matr[4] - loc2*matr[3]);
01675   return true;
01676 }
01677 
01678 inline bool g_fcn_3e_v0(double &obj, Vector3D &g_obj, const Vector3D x[4],
01679                         const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01680 {
01681   static Vector3D my_x[4];
01682 
01683   my_x[0] = x[1];
01684   my_x[1] = x[3];
01685   my_x[2] = x[2];
01686   my_x[3] = x[0];
01687   return g_fcn_3e_v3(obj, g_obj, my_x, a, b, c);
01688 }
01689 
01690 inline bool g_fcn_3e_v1(double &obj, Vector3D &g_obj, const Vector3D x[4],
01691                         const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01692 {
01693   static Vector3D my_x[4];
01694 
01695   my_x[0] = x[0];
01696   my_x[1] = x[2];
01697   my_x[2] = x[3];
01698   my_x[3] = x[1];
01699   return g_fcn_3e_v3(obj, g_obj, my_x, a, b, c);
01700 }
01701 
01702 inline bool g_fcn_3e_v2(double &obj, Vector3D &g_obj, const Vector3D x[4],
01703                         const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01704 {
01705   static Vector3D my_x[4];
01706 
01707   my_x[0] = x[1];
01708   my_x[1] = x[0];
01709   my_x[2] = x[3];
01710   my_x[3] = x[2];
01711   return g_fcn_3e_v3(obj, g_obj, my_x, a, b, c);
01712 }
01713 
01714 inline bool h_fcn_3e_v3(double &obj, Vector3D &g_obj, Matrix3D &h_obj,
01715                         const Vector3D x[4],
01716                         const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01717 {
01718   double matr[9], f, g;
01719   double dg[9], loc0, /*loc1,*/ loc3, loc4;
01720   double cross;
01721 
01722   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
01723   f       = x[1][0] + x[0][0];
01724   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
01725   matr[1] = (2.0*x[2][0] - f)*isqrt3;
01726   matr[2] = (3.0*x[3][0] - x[2][0] - f)*isqrt6;
01727 
01728   f       = x[1][1] + x[0][1];
01729   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
01730   matr[4] = (2.0*x[2][1] - f)*isqrt3;
01731   matr[5] = (3.0*x[3][1] - x[2][1] - f)*isqrt6;
01732 
01733   f       = x[1][2] + x[0][2];
01734   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
01735   matr[7] = (2.0*x[2][2] - f)*isqrt3;
01736   matr[8] = (3.0*x[3][2] - x[2][2] - f)*isqrt6;
01737 
01738   /* Calculate det(M). */
01739   dg[0] = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
01740   dg[1] = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
01741   dg[2] = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
01742   g = matr[0]*dg[0] + matr[1]*dg[1] + matr[2]*dg[2];
01743   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
01744 
01745   /* Calculate norm(M). */
01746   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] + 
01747       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
01748       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
01749 
01750   loc3 = f;
01751   loc4 = g;
01752 
01753   /* Calculate objective function. */
01754   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
01755 
01756   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
01757   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
01758   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
01759   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
01760 
01761   dg[5] = matr[1]*matr[6] - matr[0]*matr[7];
01762   dg[8] = matr[0]*matr[4] - matr[1]*matr[3];
01763 
01764   g_obj[0] = tisqrt6*(matr[2]*f + dg[2]*g);
01765   g_obj[1] = tisqrt6*(matr[5]*f + dg[5]*g);
01766   g_obj[2] = tisqrt6*(matr[8]*f + dg[8]*g);
01767 
01768   /* Calculate the hessian of the objective.                   */
01769   loc0 = f;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 f       */
01770 //  loc1 = g;                   /* Constant on nabla^2 g       */
01771   cross = f * c.value() / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla f */
01772   f = f * (b.value()-1) / loc3;         /* Constant on nabla f nabla f */
01773   g = g * (c.value()-1) / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla g */
01774   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f    */
01775 
01776   /* First block of rows */
01777   loc3 = matr[2]*f + dg[2]*cross;
01778   loc4 = dg[2]*g + matr[2]*cross;
01779 
01780   h_obj[0][0] = 1.5*(loc0 + loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2]);
01781   h_obj[0][1] = 1.5*(loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5]);
01782   h_obj[0][2] = 1.5*(loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8]);
01783 
01784   /* Second block of rows */
01785   loc3 = matr[5]*f + dg[5]*cross;
01786   loc4 = dg[5]*g + matr[5]*cross;
01787 
01788   h_obj[1][1] = 1.5*(loc0 + loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5]);
01789   h_obj[1][2] = 1.5*(loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8]);
01790 
01791   /* Third block of rows */
01792   loc3 = matr[8]*f + dg[8]*cross;
01793   loc4 = dg[8]*g + matr[8]*cross;
01794 
01795   h_obj[2][2] = 1.5*(loc0 + loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8]);
01796 
01797   // completes diagonal block.
01798   h_obj.fill_lower_triangle();
01799   return true;
01800 }
01801 
01802 inline bool h_fcn_3e_v0(double &obj, Vector3D &g_obj, Matrix3D &h_obj,
01803                         const Vector3D x[4],
01804                         const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01805 {
01806   static Vector3D my_x[4];
01807 
01808   my_x[0] = x[1];
01809   my_x[1] = x[3];
01810   my_x[2] = x[2];
01811   my_x[3] = x[0];
01812   return h_fcn_3e_v3(obj, g_obj, h_obj, my_x, a, b, c);
01813 }
01814 
01815 inline bool h_fcn_3e_v1(double &obj, Vector3D &g_obj, Matrix3D &h_obj,
01816                         const Vector3D x[4],
01817                         const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01818 {
01819   static Vector3D my_x[4];
01820 
01821   my_x[0] = x[0];
01822   my_x[1] = x[2];
01823   my_x[2] = x[3];
01824   my_x[3] = x[1];
01825   return h_fcn_3e_v3(obj, g_obj, h_obj, my_x, a, b, c);
01826 }
01827 
01828 inline bool h_fcn_3e_v2(double &obj, Vector3D &g_obj, Matrix3D &h_obj,
01829                         const Vector3D x[4],
01830                         const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
01831 {
01832   static Vector3D my_x[4];
01833 
01834   my_x[0] = x[1];
01835   my_x[1] = x[0];
01836   my_x[2] = x[3];
01837   my_x[3] = x[2];
01838   return h_fcn_3e_v3(obj, g_obj, h_obj, my_x, a, b, c);
01839 }
01840 
01841 /*****************************************************************************/
01842 /* The following set of functions reference tetrahedral elements to a        */
01843 /* right tetrahedron.  They are used when assessing the quality of a         */
01844 /* hexahedral element.  A zero return value indicates success, while         */
01845 /* a nonzero value indicates failure.                                        */
01846 /*****************************************************************************/
01847 
01848 /*****************************************************************************/
01849 /* Function evaluation requires 53 flops.                                    */
01850 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1, c == 1, or d == 1                      */
01851 /*****************************************************************************/
01852 inline bool m_fcn_3i(double &obj, const Vector3D x[4], 
01853                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c,
01854                      const Vector3D &d)
01855 {
01856   double matr[9], f;
01857   double g;
01858 
01859   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
01860   matr[0] = d[0]*(x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
01861   matr[1] = d[1]*(x[2][0] - x[0][0]);
01862   matr[2] = d[2]*(x[3][0] - x[0][0]);
01863 
01864   matr[3] = d[0]*(x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
01865   matr[4] = d[1]*(x[2][1] - x[0][1]);
01866   matr[5] = d[2]*(x[3][1] - x[0][1]);
01867 
01868   matr[6] = d[0]*(x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
01869   matr[7] = d[1]*(x[2][2] - x[0][2]);
01870   matr[8] = d[2]*(x[3][2] - x[0][2]);
01871 
01872   /* Calculate det(M). */
01873   g = matr[0]*(matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7]) +
01874       matr[1]*(matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8]) +
01875       matr[2]*(matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6]);
01876   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
01877 
01878   /* Calculate norm(M). */
01879   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] +
01880       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
01881       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
01882 
01883   /* Calculate objective function. */
01884   obj = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
01885   return true;
01886 }
01887 
01888 /*****************************************************************************/
01889 /* Gradient evaluation requires 115 flops.                                   */
01890 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1, c == 1, or d == 1                      */
01891 /*****************************************************************************/
01892 inline bool g_fcn_3i(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[4], const Vector3D x[4], 
01893                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c,
01894                      const Vector3D &d)
01895 {
01896   double matr[9], f;
01897   double adj_m[9], g;
01898   double loc1, loc2, loc3;
01899 
01900   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
01901   matr[0] = d[0]*(x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
01902   matr[1] = d[1]*(x[2][0] - x[0][0]);
01903   matr[2] = d[2]*(x[3][0] - x[0][0]);
01904 
01905   matr[3] = d[0]*(x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
01906   matr[4] = d[1]*(x[2][1] - x[0][1]);
01907   matr[5] = d[2]*(x[3][1] - x[0][1]);
01908 
01909   matr[6] = d[0]*(x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
01910   matr[7] = d[1]*(x[2][2] - x[0][2]);
01911   matr[8] = d[2]*(x[3][2] - x[0][2]);
01912 
01913   /* Calculate det(M). */
01914   loc1 = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
01915   loc2 = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
01916   loc3 = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
01917   g = matr[0]*loc1 + matr[1]*loc2 + matr[2]*loc3;
01918   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
01919 
01920   /* Calculate norm(M). */
01921   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] + 
01922       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
01923       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
01924  
01925   /* Calculate objective function. */
01926   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
01927 
01928   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
01929   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
01930   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
01931   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
01932 
01933   adj_m[0] = d[0]*(matr[0]*f + loc1*g);
01934   adj_m[1] = d[1]*(matr[1]*f + loc2*g);
01935   adj_m[2] = d[2]*(matr[2]*f + loc3*g);
01936 
01937   loc1 = matr[0]*g;
01938   loc2 = matr[1]*g;
01939   loc3 = matr[2]*g;
01940 
01941   adj_m[3] = d[0]*(matr[3]*f + loc3*matr[7] - loc2*matr[8]);
01942   adj_m[4] = d[1]*(matr[4]*f + loc1*matr[8] - loc3*matr[6]);
01943   adj_m[5] = d[2]*(matr[5]*f + loc2*matr[6] - loc1*matr[7]);
01944 
01945   adj_m[6] = d[0]*(matr[6]*f + loc2*matr[5] - loc3*matr[4]);
01946   adj_m[7] = d[1]*(matr[7]*f + loc3*matr[3] - loc1*matr[5]);
01947   adj_m[8] = d[2]*(matr[8]*f + loc1*matr[4] - loc2*matr[3]);
01948 
01949   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - adj_m[1] - adj_m[2];
01950   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0];
01951   g_obj[2][0] =  adj_m[1];
01952   g_obj[3][0] =  adj_m[2];
01953 
01954   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - adj_m[4] - adj_m[5];
01955   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3];
01956   g_obj[2][1] =  adj_m[4];
01957   g_obj[3][1] =  adj_m[5];
01958 
01959   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - adj_m[7] - adj_m[8];
01960   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6];
01961   g_obj[2][2] =  adj_m[7];
01962   g_obj[3][2] =  adj_m[8];
01963   return true;
01964 }
01965 
01966 /*****************************************************************************/
01967 /* Hessian evaluation requires 469 flops.                                    */
01968 /*   Reductions possible when b == 1, c == 1, or d == 1                      */
01969 /*****************************************************************************/
01970 inline int h_fcn_3i(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[4], Matrix3D h_obj[10], 
01971                     const Vector3D x[4], 
01972                     const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c,
01973                     const Vector3D &d)
01974 {
01975   double matr[9], f;
01976   double adj_m[9], g;
01977   double dg[9], loc0, loc1, loc2, loc3, loc4;
01978   double A[3], J_A[6], J_B[9], J_C[9], cross;
01979 
01980   const double scale[6] = {
01981     d[0]*d[0], d[0]*d[1], d[0]*d[2],
01982     d[1]*d[1], d[1]*d[2],
01983     d[2]*d[2]
01984   };
01985 
01986   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
01987   matr[0] = d[0]*(x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
01988   matr[1] = d[1]*(x[2][0] - x[0][0]);
01989   matr[2] = d[2]*(x[3][0] - x[0][0]);
01990 
01991   matr[3] = d[0]*(x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
01992   matr[4] = d[1]*(x[2][1] - x[0][1]);
01993   matr[5] = d[2]*(x[3][1] - x[0][1]);
01994 
01995   matr[6] = d[0]*(x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
01996   matr[7] = d[1]*(x[2][2] - x[0][2]);
01997   matr[8] = d[2]*(x[3][2] - x[0][2]);
01998 
01999   /* Calculate det(M). */
02000   dg[0] = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
02001   dg[1] = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
02002   dg[2] = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
02003   g = matr[0]*dg[0] + matr[1]*dg[1] + matr[2]*dg[2];
02004   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
02005 
02006   /* Calculate norm(M). */
02007   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] + 
02008     matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
02009     matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
02010 
02011   loc3 = f;
02012   loc4 = g;
02013 
02014   /* Calculate objective function. */
02015   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
02016 
02017   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
02018   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
02019   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
02020   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
02021 
02022   dg[3] = matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8];
02023   dg[4] = matr[0]*matr[8] - matr[2]*matr[6];
02024   dg[5] = matr[1]*matr[6] - matr[0]*matr[7];
02025   dg[6] = matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4];
02026   dg[7] = matr[2]*matr[3] - matr[0]*matr[5];
02027   dg[8] = matr[0]*matr[4] - matr[1]*matr[3];
02028 
02029   adj_m[0] = d[0]*(matr[0]*f + dg[0]*g);
02030   adj_m[1] = d[1]*(matr[1]*f + dg[1]*g);
02031   adj_m[2] = d[2]*(matr[2]*f + dg[2]*g);
02032   adj_m[3] = d[0]*(matr[3]*f + dg[3]*g);
02033   adj_m[4] = d[1]*(matr[4]*f + dg[4]*g);
02034   adj_m[5] = d[2]*(matr[5]*f + dg[5]*g);
02035   adj_m[6] = d[0]*(matr[6]*f + dg[6]*g);
02036   adj_m[7] = d[1]*(matr[7]*f + dg[7]*g);
02037   adj_m[8] = d[2]*(matr[8]*f + dg[8]*g);
02038 
02039   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - adj_m[1] - adj_m[2];
02040   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0];
02041   g_obj[2][0] =  adj_m[1];
02042   g_obj[3][0] =  adj_m[2];
02043 
02044   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - adj_m[4] - adj_m[5];
02045   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3];
02046   g_obj[2][1] =  adj_m[4];
02047   g_obj[3][1] =  adj_m[5];
02048 
02049   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - adj_m[7] - adj_m[8];
02050   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6];
02051   g_obj[2][2] =  adj_m[7];
02052   g_obj[3][2] =  adj_m[8];
02053 
02054   /* Calculate the hessian of the objective.                   */
02055   loc0 = f;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 f       */
02056   loc1 = g;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 g       */
02057   cross = f * c.value() / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla f */
02058   f = f * (b.value()-1) / loc3;         /* Constant on nabla f nabla f */
02059   g = g * (c.value()-1) / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla g */
02060   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f    */
02061 
02062   /* First block of rows */
02063   loc3 = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*cross;
02064   loc4 = dg[0]*g + matr[0]*cross;
02065 
02066   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[0] + loc4*dg[0];
02067   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
02068   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
02069   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
02070   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02071   J_B[2] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02072   J_C[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02073   J_C[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02074   J_C[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02075 
02076   loc3 = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*cross;
02077   loc4 = dg[1]*g + matr[1]*cross;
02078 
02079   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
02080   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
02081   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
02082   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02083   J_B[5] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02084   J_C[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02085   J_C[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02086   J_C[5] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02087 
02088   loc3 = matr[2]*f + dg[2]*cross;
02089   loc4 = dg[2]*g + matr[2]*cross;
02090 
02091   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
02092   J_B[6] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
02093   J_B[7] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02094   J_B[8] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02095   J_C[6] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02096   J_C[7] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02097   J_C[8] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02098 
02099   /* First diagonal block */
02100   J_A[0] *= scale[0];
02101   J_A[1] *= scale[1];
02102   J_A[2] *= scale[2];
02103   J_A[3] *= scale[3];
02104   J_A[4] *= scale[4];
02105   J_A[5] *= scale[5];
02106 
02107   A[0] = -J_A[0] - J_A[1] - J_A[2];
02108   A[1] = -J_A[1] - J_A[3] - J_A[4];
02109   A[2] = -J_A[2] - J_A[4] - J_A[5];
02110 
02111   h_obj[0][0][0] = -A[0] - A[1] - A[2];
02112   h_obj[1][0][0] =  A[0];
02113   h_obj[2][0][0] =  A[1];
02114   h_obj[3][0][0] =  A[2];
02115 
02116   h_obj[4][0][0] = J_A[0];
02117   h_obj[5][0][0] = J_A[1];
02118   h_obj[6][0][0] = J_A[2];
02119 
02120   h_obj[7][0][0] = J_A[3];
02121   h_obj[8][0][0] = J_A[4];
02122 
02123   h_obj[9][0][0] = J_A[5];
02124 
02125   /* First off-diagonal block */
02126   loc2 = matr[8]*loc1;
02127   J_B[1] += loc2;
02128   J_B[3] -= loc2;
02129 
02130   loc2 = matr[7]*loc1;
02131   J_B[2] -= loc2;
02132   J_B[6] += loc2;
02133 
02134   loc2 = matr[6]*loc1;
02135   J_B[5] += loc2;
02136   J_B[7] -= loc2;
02137 
02138   J_B[0] *= scale[0];
02139   J_B[1] *= scale[1];
02140   J_B[2] *= scale[2];
02141   J_B[3] *= scale[1];
02142   J_B[4] *= scale[3];
02143   J_B[5] *= scale[4];
02144   J_B[6] *= scale[2];
02145   J_B[7] *= scale[4];
02146   J_B[8] *= scale[5];
02147 
02148   A[0] = -J_B[0] - J_B[3] - J_B[6];
02149   A[1] = -J_B[1] - J_B[4] - J_B[7];
02150   A[2] = -J_B[2] - J_B[5] - J_B[8];
02151 
02152   h_obj[0][0][1] = -A[0] - A[1] - A[2];
02153   h_obj[1][0][1] =  A[0];
02154   h_obj[2][0][1] =  A[1];
02155   h_obj[3][0][1] =  A[2];
02156 
02157   h_obj[1][1][0] = -J_B[0] - J_B[1] - J_B[2];
02158   h_obj[4][0][1] =  J_B[0];
02159   h_obj[5][0][1] =  J_B[1];
02160   h_obj[6][0][1] =  J_B[2];
02161 
02162   h_obj[2][1][0] = -J_B[3] - J_B[4] - J_B[5];
02163   h_obj[5][1][0] =  J_B[3];
02164   h_obj[7][0][1] =  J_B[4];
02165   h_obj[8][0][1] =  J_B[5];
02166 
02167   h_obj[3][1][0] = -J_B[6] - J_B[7] - J_B[8];
02168   h_obj[6][1][0] =  J_B[6];
02169   h_obj[8][1][0] =  J_B[7];
02170   h_obj[9][0][1] =  J_B[8];
02171 
02172   /* Second off-diagonal block */
02173   loc2 = matr[5]*loc1;
02174   J_C[1] -= loc2;
02175   J_C[3] += loc2;
02176 
02177   loc2 = matr[4]*loc1;
02178   J_C[2] += loc2;
02179   J_C[6] -= loc2;
02180 
02181   loc2 = matr[3]*loc1;
02182   J_C[5] -= loc2;
02183   J_C[7] += loc2;
02184 
02185   J_C[0] *= scale[0];
02186   J_C[1] *= scale[1];
02187   J_C[2] *= scale[2];
02188   J_C[3] *= scale[1];
02189   J_C[4] *= scale[3];
02190   J_C[5] *= scale[4];
02191   J_C[6] *= scale[2];
02192   J_C[7] *= scale[4];
02193   J_C[8] *= scale[5];
02194 
02195   A[0] = -J_C[0] - J_C[3] - J_C[6];
02196   A[1] = -J_C[1] - J_C[4] - J_C[7];
02197   A[2] = -J_C[2] - J_C[5] - J_C[8];
02198 
02199   h_obj[0][0][2] = -A[0] - A[1] - A[2];
02200   h_obj[1][0][2] =  A[0];
02201   h_obj[2][0][2] =  A[1];
02202   h_obj[3][0][2] =  A[2];
02203 
02204   h_obj[1][2][0] = -J_C[0] - J_C[1] - J_C[2];
02205   h_obj[4][0][2] =  J_C[0];
02206   h_obj[5][0][2] =  J_C[1];
02207   h_obj[6][0][2] =  J_C[2];
02208 
02209   h_obj[2][2][0] = -J_C[3] - J_C[4] - J_C[5];
02210   h_obj[5][2][0] =  J_C[3];
02211   h_obj[7][0][2] =  J_C[4];
02212   h_obj[8][0][2] =  J_C[5];
02213 
02214   h_obj[3][2][0] = -J_C[6] - J_C[7] - J_C[8];
02215   h_obj[6][2][0] =  J_C[6];
02216   h_obj[8][2][0] =  J_C[7];
02217   h_obj[9][0][2] =  J_C[8];
02218 
02219   /* Second block of rows */
02220   loc3 = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*cross;
02221   loc4 = dg[3]*g + matr[3]*cross;
02222
