02223   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
02224   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02225   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02226   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02227   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02228   J_B[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02229 
02230   loc3 = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*cross;
02231   loc4 = dg[4]*g + matr[4]*cross;
02232 
02233   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02234   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02235   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02236   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02237   J_B[5] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02238 
02239   loc3 = matr[5]*f + dg[5]*cross;
02240   loc4 = dg[5]*g + matr[5]*cross;
02241 
02242   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02243   J_B[6] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02244   J_B[7] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02245   J_B[8] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02246 
02247   /* Second diagonal block */
02248   J_A[0] *= scale[0];
02249   J_A[1] *= scale[1];
02250   J_A[2] *= scale[2];
02251   J_A[3] *= scale[3];
02252   J_A[4] *= scale[4];
02253   J_A[5] *= scale[5];
02254 
02255   A[0] = -J_A[0] - J_A[1] - J_A[2];
02256   A[1] = -J_A[1] - J_A[3] - J_A[4];
02257   A[2] = -J_A[2] - J_A[4] - J_A[5];
02258 
02259   h_obj[0][1][1] = -A[0] - A[1] - A[2];
02260   h_obj[1][1][1] =  A[0];
02261   h_obj[2][1][1] =  A[1];
02262   h_obj[3][1][1] =  A[2];
02263 
02264   h_obj[4][1][1] = J_A[0];
02265   h_obj[5][1][1] = J_A[1];
02266   h_obj[6][1][1] = J_A[2];
02267 
02268   h_obj[7][1][1] = J_A[3];
02269   h_obj[8][1][1] = J_A[4];
02270 
02271   h_obj[9][1][1] = J_A[5];
02272 
02273   /* Third off-diagonal block */
02274   loc2 = matr[2]*loc1;
02275   J_B[1] += loc2;
02276   J_B[3] -= loc2;
02277 
02278   loc2 = matr[1]*loc1;
02279   J_B[2] -= loc2;
02280   J_B[6] += loc2;
02281 
02282   loc2 = matr[0]*loc1;
02283   J_B[5] += loc2;
02284   J_B[7] -= loc2;
02285 
02286   J_B[0] *= scale[0];
02287   J_B[1] *= scale[1];
02288   J_B[2] *= scale[2];
02289   J_B[3] *= scale[1];
02290   J_B[4] *= scale[3];
02291   J_B[5] *= scale[4];
02292   J_B[6] *= scale[2];
02293   J_B[7] *= scale[4];
02294   J_B[8] *= scale[5];
02295 
02296   A[0] = -J_B[0] - J_B[3] - J_B[6];
02297   A[1] = -J_B[1] - J_B[4] - J_B[7];
02298   A[2] = -J_B[2] - J_B[5] - J_B[8];
02299 
02300   h_obj[0][1][2] = -A[0] - A[1] - A[2];
02301   h_obj[1][1][2] =  A[0];
02302   h_obj[2][1][2] =  A[1];
02303   h_obj[3][1][2] =  A[2];
02304 
02305   h_obj[1][2][1] = -J_B[0] - J_B[1] - J_B[2];
02306   h_obj[4][1][2] =  J_B[0];
02307   h_obj[5][1][2] =  J_B[1];
02308   h_obj[6][1][2] =  J_B[2];
02309 
02310   h_obj[2][2][1] = -J_B[3] - J_B[4] - J_B[5];
02311   h_obj[5][2][1] =  J_B[3];
02312   h_obj[7][1][2] =  J_B[4];
02313   h_obj[8][1][2] =  J_B[5];
02314 
02315   h_obj[3][2][1] = -J_B[6] - J_B[7] - J_B[8];
02316   h_obj[6][2][1] =  J_B[6];
02317   h_obj[8][2][1] =  J_B[7];
02318   h_obj[9][1][2] =  J_B[8];
02319 
02320   /* Third block of rows */
02321   loc3 = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*cross;
02322   loc4 = dg[6]*g + matr[6]*cross;
02323 
02324   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02325   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02326   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02327 
02328   loc3 = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*cross;
02329   loc4 = dg[7]*g + matr[7]*cross;
02330 
02331   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02332   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02333 
02334   loc3 = matr[8]*f + dg[8]*cross;
02335   loc4 = dg[8]*g + matr[8]*cross;
02336 
02337   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02338 
02339   /* Third diagonal block */
02340   J_A[0] *= scale[0];
02341   J_A[1] *= scale[1];
02342   J_A[2] *= scale[2];
02343   J_A[3] *= scale[3];
02344   J_A[4] *= scale[4];
02345   J_A[5] *= scale[5];
02346 
02347   A[0] = -J_A[0] - J_A[1] - J_A[2];
02348   A[1] = -J_A[1] - J_A[3] - J_A[4];
02349   A[2] = -J_A[2] - J_A[4] - J_A[5];
02350 
02351   h_obj[0][2][2] = -A[0] - A[1] - A[2];
02352   h_obj[1][2][2] =  A[0];
02353   h_obj[2][2][2] =  A[1];
02354   h_obj[3][2][2] =  A[2];
02355 
02356   h_obj[4][2][2] = J_A[0];
02357   h_obj[5][2][2] = J_A[1];
02358   h_obj[6][2][2] = J_A[2];
02359 
02360   h_obj[7][2][2] = J_A[3];
02361   h_obj[8][2][2] = J_A[4];
02362 
02363   h_obj[9][2][2] = J_A[5];
02364 
02365   // completes diagonal blocks.
02366   h_obj[0].fill_lower_triangle();
02367   h_obj[4].fill_lower_triangle();
02368   h_obj[7].fill_lower_triangle();
02369   h_obj[9].fill_lower_triangle();
02370   return true;
02371 }
02372 
02373 /********************************************************************* 
02374  * Reference tetrahedral elements to halves of an ideal pyramid.
02375  * Vertices should be ordered such that the edge between the 2nd and
02376  * 3rd vertices is the one longer edge in the reference tetrahedron
02377  * (the diagonal of the base of the pyramid of which the tetrahedron
02378  * is one half of).
02379  *      1  0  1/2                     1  0 -1/sqrt(2)
02380  * W =  0  1  1/2           inv(W) =  0  1 -1/sqrt(2)
02381  *      0  0  1/sqrt(2)               0  0  sqrt(2)
02382  *
02383  *********************************************************************/
02384 inline bool m_fcn_3p(double &obj, const Vector3D x[4],
02385          const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
02386 {
02387   const double h = 0.5;         /* h = 1 / (2*height) */
02388 
02389   double matr[9], f;
02390   double g;
02391 
02392   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
02393   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
02394   matr[1] = x[2][0] - x[0][0];
02395   matr[2] = (2.0*x[3][0] - x[1][0] - x[2][0])*h;
02396   
02397   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
02398   matr[4] = x[2][1] - x[0][1];
02399   matr[5] = (2.0*x[3][1] - x[1][1] - x[2][1])*h;
02400   
02401   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
02402   matr[7] = x[2][2] - x[0][2];
02403   matr[8] = (2.0*x[3][2] - x[1][2] - x[2][2])*h;
02404 
02405   /* Calculate det(M). */
02406   g = matr[0]*(matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7]) +
02407       matr[1]*(matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8]) +
02408       matr[2]*(matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6]);
02409   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
02410 
02411   /* Calculate norm(M). */
02412   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] +
02413       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
02414       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
02415 
02416   /* Calculate objective function. */
02417   obj = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
02418   return true;
02419 }
02420 
02421 inline bool g_fcn_3p(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[4], const Vector3D x[4],
02422          const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
02423 {
02424   const double h  = 0.5;        /* h = 1 / (2*height) */
02425   const double th = 1.0;        /* h = 1 / (height)   */
02426 
02427   double matr[9], f;
02428   double adj_m[9], g;
02429   double loc1, loc2, loc3;
02430 
02431   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
02432   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
02433   matr[1] = x[2][0] - x[0][0];
02434   matr[2] = (2.0*x[3][0] - x[1][0] - x[2][0])*h;
02435   
02436   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
02437   matr[4] = x[2][1] - x[0][1];
02438   matr[5] = (2.0*x[3][1] - x[1][1] - x[2][1])*h;
02439   
02440   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
02441   matr[7] = x[2][2] - x[0][2];
02442   matr[8] = (2.0*x[3][2] - x[1][2] - x[2][2])*h;
02443 
02444   /* Calculate det(M). */
02445   loc1 = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
02446   loc2 = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
02447   loc3 = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
02448   g = matr[0]*loc1 + matr[1]*loc2 + matr[2]*loc3;
02449   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
02450 
02451   /* Calculate norm(M). */
02452   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] +
02453       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
02454       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
02455 
02456   /* Calculate objective function. */
02457   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
02458 
02459   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
02460   f = b.value() * obj / f;    /* Constant on nabla f      */
02461   g = c.value() * obj / g;    /* Constant on nable g      */
02462   f *= 2.0;           /* Modification for nabla f */
02463 
02464   adj_m[0] = matr[0]*f + loc1*g;
02465   adj_m[1] = matr[1]*f + loc2*g;
02466   adj_m[2] = matr[2]*f + loc3*g;
02467 
02468   loc1 = matr[0]*g;
02469   loc2 = matr[1]*g;
02470   loc3 = matr[2]*g;
02471 
02472   adj_m[3] = matr[3]*f + loc3*matr[7] - loc2*matr[8];
02473   adj_m[4] = matr[4]*f + loc1*matr[8] - loc3*matr[6];
02474   adj_m[5] = matr[5]*f + loc2*matr[6] - loc1*matr[7];
02475 
02476   adj_m[6] = matr[6]*f + loc2*matr[5] - loc3*matr[4];
02477   adj_m[7] = matr[7]*f + loc3*matr[3] - loc1*matr[5];
02478   adj_m[8] = matr[8]*f + loc1*matr[4] - loc2*matr[3];
02479 
02480   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] -    adj_m[1];
02481   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0] -  h*adj_m[2];
02482   g_obj[2][0] =  adj_m[1] -  h*adj_m[2];
02483   g_obj[3][0] =             th*adj_m[2];
02484 
02485   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] -    adj_m[4];
02486   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3] -  h*adj_m[5];
02487   g_obj[2][1] =  adj_m[4] -  h*adj_m[5];
02488   g_obj[3][1] =             th*adj_m[5];
02489 
02490   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] -    adj_m[7];
02491   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6] -  h*adj_m[8];
02492   g_obj[2][2] =  adj_m[7] -  h*adj_m[8];
02493   g_obj[3][2] =             th*adj_m[8];
02494   return true;
02495 }
02496 
02497 
02498 inline bool h_fcn_3p(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[4], Matrix3D h_obj[10], 
02499                      const Vector3D x[4],
02500                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
02501 {
02502   const double h  = 0.5;        /* h = 1 / (2*height) */
02503   const double th = 1.0;        /* h = 1 / (height)   */
02504 
02505   double matr[9], f;
02506   double adj_m[9], g;
02507   double dg[9], loc0, loc1, loc2, loc3, loc4;
02508   double A[12], J_A[6], J_B[9], J_C[9], cross;
02509 
02510   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
02511   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
02512   matr[1] = x[2][0] - x[0][0];
02513   matr[2] = (2.0*x[3][0] - x[1][0] - x[2][0])*h;
02514 
02515   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
02516   matr[4] = x[2][1] - x[0][1];
02517   matr[5] = (2.0*x[3][1] - x[1][1] - x[2][1])*h;
02518 
02519   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
02520   matr[7] = x[2][2] - x[0][2];
02521   matr[8] = (2.0*x[3][2] - x[1][2] - x[2][2])*h;
02522 
02523   /* Calculate det(M). */
02524   dg[0] = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
02525   dg[1] = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
02526   dg[2] = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
02527   g = matr[0]*dg[0] + matr[1]*dg[1] + matr[2]*dg[2];
02528   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
02529 
02530   dg[3] = matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8];
02531   dg[4] = matr[0]*matr[8] - matr[2]*matr[6];
02532   dg[5] = matr[1]*matr[6] - matr[0]*matr[7];
02533   dg[6] = matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4];
02534   dg[7] = matr[2]*matr[3] - matr[0]*matr[5];
02535   dg[8] = matr[0]*matr[4] - matr[1]*matr[3];
02536 
02537   /* Calculate norm(M). */
02538   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] + 
02539       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
02540       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
02541 
02542   loc3 = f;
02543   loc4 = g;
02544 
02545   /* Calculate objective function. */
02546   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
02547 
02548   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
02549   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
02550   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
02551   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
02552 
02553   adj_m[0] = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*g;
02554   adj_m[1] = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*g;
02555   adj_m[2] = matr[2]*f + dg[2]*g;
02556   adj_m[3] = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*g;
02557   adj_m[4] = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*g;
02558   adj_m[5] = matr[5]*f + dg[5]*g;
02559   adj_m[6] = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*g;
02560   adj_m[7] = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*g;
02561   adj_m[8] = matr[8]*f + dg[8]*g;
02562 
02563   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] -    adj_m[1];
02564   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0] -  h*adj_m[2];
02565   g_obj[2][0] =  adj_m[1] -  h*adj_m[2];
02566   g_obj[3][0] =             th*adj_m[2];
02567 
02568   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] -    adj_m[4];
02569   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3] -  h*adj_m[5];
02570   g_obj[2][1] =  adj_m[4] -  h*adj_m[5];
02571   g_obj[3][1] =             th*adj_m[5];
02572 
02573   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] -    adj_m[7];
02574   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6] -  h*adj_m[8];
02575   g_obj[2][2] =  adj_m[7] -  h*adj_m[8];
02576   g_obj[3][2] =             th*adj_m[8];
02577 
02578   /* Calculate the hessian of the objective.                   */
02579   loc0 = f;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 f       */
02580   loc1 = g;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 g       */
02581   cross = f * c.value() / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla f */
02582   f = f * (b.value()-1) / loc3;         /* Constant on nabla f nabla f */
02583   g = g * (c.value()-1) / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla g */
02584   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f    */
02585 
02586   /* First block of rows */
02587   loc3 = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*cross;
02588   loc4 = dg[0]*g + matr[0]*cross;
02589 
02590   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[0] + loc4*dg[0];
02591   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
02592   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
02593   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
02594   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02595   J_B[2] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02596   J_C[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02597   J_C[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02598   J_C[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02599 
02600   loc3 = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*cross;
02601   loc4 = dg[1]*g + matr[1]*cross;
02602 
02603   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
02604   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
02605   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
02606   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02607   J_B[5] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02608   J_C[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02609   J_C[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02610   J_C[5] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02611 
02612   loc3 = matr[2]*f + dg[2]*cross;
02613   loc4 = dg[2]*g + matr[2]*cross;
02614 
02615   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
02616   J_B[6] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
02617   J_B[7] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02618   J_B[8] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02619   J_C[6] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02620   J_C[7] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02621   J_C[8] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02622 
02623   /* First diagonal block */
02624   A[0] = -J_A[0] -    J_A[1];
02625   A[1] =  J_A[0] -  h*J_A[2];
02626   A[2] =  J_A[1] -  h*J_A[2];
02627   A[3] =           th*J_A[2];
02628   
02629   A[4] = -J_A[1] -    J_A[3];
02630   A[5] =  J_A[1] -  h*J_A[4];
02631   A[6] =  J_A[3] -  h*J_A[4];
02632   A[7] =           th*J_A[4];
02633 
02634   A[8]  = -J_A[2] -    J_A[4];
02635   A[9]  =  J_A[2] -  h*J_A[5];
02636   A[10] =  J_A[4] -  h*J_A[5];
02637   A[11] =           th*J_A[5];
02638 
02639   h_obj[0][0][0] = -A[0] -    A[4];
02640   h_obj[1][0][0] =  A[0] -  h*A[8];
02641   h_obj[2][0][0] =  A[4] -  h*A[8];
02642   h_obj[3][0][0] =         th*A[8];
02643 
02644   h_obj[4][0][0] =  A[1] -  h*A[9];
02645   h_obj[5][0][0] =  A[5] -  h*A[9];
02646   h_obj[6][0][0] =         th*A[9];
02647   
02648   h_obj[7][0][0] =  A[6] -  h*A[10];
02649   h_obj[8][0][0] =         th*A[10];
02650 
02651   h_obj[9][0][0] =         th*A[11];
02652 
02653   /* First off-diagonal block */
02654   loc2 = matr[8]*loc1;
02655   J_B[1] += loc2;
02656   J_B[3] -= loc2;
02657 
02658   loc2 = matr[7]*loc1;
02659   J_B[2] -= loc2;
02660   J_B[6] += loc2;
02661 
02662   loc2 = matr[6]*loc1;
02663   J_B[5] += loc2;
02664   J_B[7] -= loc2;
02665 
02666   A[0] = -J_B[0] -    J_B[1];
02667   A[1] =  J_B[0] -  h*J_B[2];
02668   A[2] =  J_B[1] -  h*J_B[2];
02669   A[3] =           th*J_B[2];
02670   
02671   A[4] = -J_B[3] -    J_B[4];
02672   A[5] =  J_B[3] -  h*J_B[5];
02673   A[6] =  J_B[4] -  h*J_B[5];
02674   A[7] =           th*J_B[5];
02675 
02676   A[8]  = -J_B[6] -    J_B[7];
02677   A[9]  =  J_B[6] -  h*J_B[8];
02678   A[10] =  J_B[7] -  h*J_B[8];
02679   A[11] =           th*J_B[8];
02680 
02681   h_obj[0][0][1] = -A[0] -    A[4];
02682   h_obj[1][1][0] =  A[0] -  h*A[8];
02683   h_obj[2][1][0] =  A[4] -  h*A[8];
02684   h_obj[3][1][0] =         th*A[8];
02685 
02686   h_obj[1][0][1] = -A[1] -    A[5];
02687   h_obj[4][0][1] =  A[1] -  h*A[9];
02688   h_obj[5][1][0] =  A[5] -  h*A[9];
02689   h_obj[6][1][0] =         th*A[9];
02690 
02691   h_obj[2][0][1] = -A[2] -    A[6];
02692   h_obj[5][0][1] =  A[2] -  h*A[10];
02693   h_obj[7][0][1] =  A[6] -  h*A[10];
02694   h_obj[8][1][0] =         th*A[10];
02695 
02696   h_obj[3][0][1] = -A[3] -    A[7];
02697   h_obj[6][0][1] =  A[3] -  h*A[11];
02698   h_obj[8][0][1] =  A[7] -  h*A[11];
02699   h_obj[9][0][1] =         th*A[11];
02700 
02701   /* Second off-diagonal block */
02702   loc2 = matr[5]*loc1;
02703   J_C[1] -= loc2;
02704   J_C[3] += loc2;
02705 
02706   loc2 = matr[4]*loc1;
02707   J_C[2] += loc2;
02708   J_C[6] -= loc2;
02709 
02710   loc2 = matr[3]*loc1;
02711   J_C[5] -= loc2;
02712   J_C[7] += loc2;
02713 
02714   A[0] = -J_C[0] -    J_C[1];
02715   A[1] =  J_C[0] -  h*J_C[2];
02716   A[2] =  J_C[1] -  h*J_C[2];
02717   A[3] =           th*J_C[2];
02718   
02719   A[4] = -J_C[3] -    J_C[4];
02720   A[5] =  J_C[3] -  h*J_C[5];
02721   A[6] =  J_C[4] -  h*J_C[5];
02722   A[7] =           th*J_C[5];
02723 
02724   A[8]  = -J_C[6] -    J_C[7];
02725   A[9]  =  J_C[6] -  h*J_C[8];
02726   A[10] =  J_C[7] -  h*J_C[8];
02727   A[11] =           th*J_C[8];
02728 
02729   h_obj[0][0][2] = -A[0] -    A[4];
02730   h_obj[1][2][0] =  A[0] -  h*A[8];
02731   h_obj[2][2][0] =  A[4] -  h*A[8];
02732   h_obj[3][2][0] =         th*A[8];
02733 
02734   h_obj[1][0][2] = -A[1] -    A[5];
02735   h_obj[4][0][2] =  A[1] -  h*A[9];
02736   h_obj[5][2][0] =  A[5] -  h*A[9];
02737   h_obj[6][2][0] =         th*A[9];
02738 
02739   h_obj[2][0][2] = -A[2] -    A[6];
02740   h_obj[5][0][2] =  A[2] -  h*A[10];
02741   h_obj[7][0][2] =  A[6] -  h*A[10];
02742   h_obj[8][2][0] =         th*A[10];
02743 
02744   h_obj[3][0][2] = -A[3] -    A[7];
02745   h_obj[6][0][2] =  A[3] -  h*A[11];
02746   h_obj[8][0][2] =  A[7] -  h*A[11];
02747   h_obj[9][0][2] =         th*A[11];
02748 
02749   /* Second block of rows */
02750   loc3 = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*cross;
02751   loc4 = dg[3]*g + matr[3]*cross;
02752 
02753   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
02754   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02755   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02756   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02757   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02758   J_B[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02759 
02760   loc3 = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*cross;
02761   loc4 = dg[4]*g + matr[4]*cross;
02762 
02763   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
02764   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02765   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02766   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02767   J_B[5] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02768 
02769   loc3 = matr[5]*f + dg[5]*cross;
02770   loc4 = dg[5]*g + matr[5]*cross;
02771 
02772   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
02773   J_B[6] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02774   J_B[7] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02775   J_B[8] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02776 
02777   /* Second diagonal block */
02778   A[0] = -J_A[0] -    J_A[1];
02779   A[1] =  J_A[0] -  h*J_A[2];
02780   A[2] =  J_A[1] -  h*J_A[2];
02781   A[3] =           th*J_A[2];
02782   
02783   A[4] = -J_A[1] -    J_A[3];
02784   A[5] =  J_A[1] -  h*J_A[4];
02785   A[6] =  J_A[3] -  h*J_A[4];
02786   A[7] =           th*J_A[4];
02787 
02788   A[8]  = -J_A[2] -    J_A[4];
02789   A[9]  =  J_A[2] -  h*J_A[5];
02790   A[10] =  J_A[4] -  h*J_A[5];
02791   A[11] =           th*J_A[5];
02792 
02793   h_obj[0][1][1] = -A[0] -    A[4];
02794   h_obj[1][1][1] =  A[0] -  h*A[8];
02795   h_obj[2][1][1] =  A[4] -  h*A[8];
02796   h_obj[3][1][1] =         th*A[8];
02797 
02798   h_obj[4][1][1] =  A[1] -  h*A[9];
02799   h_obj[5][1][1] =  A[5] -  h*A[9];
02800   h_obj[6][1][1] =         th*A[9];
02801   
02802   h_obj[7][1][1] =  A[6] -  h*A[10];
02803   h_obj[8][1][1] =         th*A[10];
02804 
02805   h_obj[9][1][1] =         th*A[11];
02806 
02807   /* Third off-diagonal block */
02808   loc2 = matr[2]*loc1;
02809   J_B[1] += loc2;
02810   J_B[3] -= loc2;
02811 
02812   loc2 = matr[1]*loc1;
02813   J_B[2] -= loc2;
02814   J_B[6] += loc2;
02815 
02816   loc2 = matr[0]*loc1;
02817   J_B[5] += loc2;
02818   J_B[7] -= loc2;
02819 
02820   A[0] = -J_B[0] -    J_B[1];
02821   A[1] =  J_B[0] -  h*J_B[2];
02822   A[2] =  J_B[1] -  h*J_B[2];
02823   A[3] =           th*J_B[2];
02824   
02825   A[4] = -J_B[3] -    J_B[4];
02826   A[5] =  J_B[3] -  h*J_B[5];
02827   A[6] =  J_B[4] -  h*J_B[5];
02828   A[7] =           th*J_B[5];
02829 
02830   A[8]  = -J_B[6] -    J_B[7];
02831   A[9]  =  J_B[6] -  h*J_B[8];
02832   A[10] =  J_B[7] -  h*J_B[8];
02833   A[11] =           th*J_B[8];
02834 
02835   h_obj[0][1][2] = -A[0] -    A[4];
02836   h_obj[1][2][1] =  A[0] -  h*A[8];
02837   h_obj[2][2][1] =  A[4] -  h*A[8];
02838   h_obj[3][2][1] =         th*A[8];
02839 
02840   h_obj[1][1][2] = -A[1] -    A[5];
02841   h_obj[4][1][2] =  A[1] -  h*A[9];
02842   h_obj[5][2][1] =  A[5] -  h*A[9];
02843   h_obj[6][2][1] =         th*A[9];
02844 
02845   h_obj[2][1][2] = -A[2] -    A[6];
02846   h_obj[5][1][2] =  A[2] -  h*A[10];
02847   h_obj[7][1][2] =  A[6] -  h*A[10];
02848   h_obj[8][2][1] =         th*A[10];
02849 
02850   h_obj[3][1][2] = -A[3] -    A[7];
02851   h_obj[6][1][2] =  A[3] -  h*A[11];
02852   h_obj[8][1][2] =  A[7] -  h*A[11];
02853   h_obj[9][1][2] =         th*A[11];
02854 
02855   /* Third block of rows */
02856   loc3 = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*cross;
02857   loc4 = dg[6]*g + matr[6]*cross;
02858 
02859   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
02860   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02861   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02862 
02863   loc3 = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*cross;
02864   loc4 = dg[7]*g + matr[7]*cross;
02865 
02866   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
02867   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02868 
02869   loc3 = matr[8]*f + dg[8]*cross;
02870   loc4 = dg[8]*g + matr[8]*cross;
02871 
02872   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
02873 
02874   /* Third diagonal block */
02875   A[0] = -J_A[0] -    J_A[1];
02876   A[1] =  J_A[0] -  h*J_A[2];
02877   A[2] =  J_A[1] -  h*J_A[2];
02878   A[3] =           th*J_A[2];
02879   
02880   A[4] = -J_A[1] -    J_A[3];
02881   A[5] =  J_A[1] -  h*J_A[4];
02882   A[6] =  J_A[3] -  h*J_A[4];
02883   A[7] =           th*J_A[4];
02884 
02885   A[8]  = -J_A[2] -    J_A[4];
02886   A[9]  =  J_A[2] -  h*J_A[5];
02887   A[10] =  J_A[4] -  h*J_A[5];
02888   A[11] =           th*J_A[5];
02889 
02890   h_obj[0][2][2] = -A[0] -    A[4];
02891   h_obj[1][2][2] =  A[0] -  h*A[8];
02892   h_obj[2][2][2] =  A[4] -  h*A[8];
02893   h_obj[3][2][2] =         th*A[8];
02894 
02895   h_obj[4][2][2] =  A[1] -  h*A[9];
02896   h_obj[5][2][2] =  A[5] -  h*A[9];
02897   h_obj[6][2][2] =         th*A[9];
02898   
02899   h_obj[7][2][2] =  A[6] -  h*A[10];
02900   h_obj[8][2][2] =         th*A[10];
02901 
02902   h_obj[9][2][2] =         th*A[11];
02903 
02904 #if 0
02905   int i, j, k, l;
02906   double   nobj;
02907   Vector3D nx[4];
02908   Vector3D ng_obj[4];
02909 
02910   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
02911     nx[i] = x[i];
02912     ng_obj[i] = 0.0;
02913   }
02914 
02915   m_fcn_3p(obj, x, a, b, c);
02916   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
02917     for (j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {
02918       nx[i][j] += 1e-6;
02919       m_fcn_3p(nobj, nx, a, b, c);
02920       nx[i][j] = x[i][j];
02921 
02922       ng_obj[i][j] = (nobj - obj) / 1e-6;
02923       std::cout << i << " " << j << " " << g_obj[i][j] << " " << ng_obj[i][j] << std::endl;
02924     }
02925   }
02926   std::cout << std::endl;
02927 
02928   for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
02929     for (j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {
02930       nx[i][j] += 1e-6;
02931       g_fcn_3p(nobj, ng_obj, nx, a, b, c);
02932       nx[i][j] = x[i][j];
02933 
02934       printf("%d %d", i, j);
02935       for (k = 0; k < 4; ++k) {
02936         for (l = 0; l < 3; ++l) {
02937           printf(" % 5.4e", (ng_obj[k][l] - g_obj[k][l]) / 1e-6);
02938         }
02939       }
02940       printf("\n");
02941     }
02942   }
02943 
02944   for (i = 0; i < 10; ++i) {
02945     std::cout << i << std::endl << h_obj[i] << std::endl << std::endl;
02946   }
02947 #endif
02948 
02949   // completes diagonal blocks.
02950   h_obj[0].fill_lower_triangle();
02951   h_obj[4].fill_lower_triangle();
02952   h_obj[7].fill_lower_triangle();
02953   h_obj[9].fill_lower_triangle();
02954   return true;
02955 }
02956 
02957 
02958 /********************************************************************* 
02959  * Reference tetrahedral elements to corners of an ideal wedge element.
02960  * Vertices should be ordered such that the first three vertices form
02961  * the ideally-equaliteral face of the tetrahedron (the end of the
02962  * wedge) and the first and fourth vertices form the tetrahedral edge
02963  * orthogonal to the ideally-equaliteral face (the lateral edge of the
02964  * edge.)
02965  *      1  1/2        0                     1  -1/sqrt(3)  0
02966  * W =  0  sqrt(3)/2  0           inv(W) =  0   2/sqrt(3)  0
02967  *      0  0          1                     0   0          1
02968  *
02969  *********************************************************************/
02970 inline bool m_fcn_3w(double &obj, const Vector3D x[4],
02971          const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
02972 {
02973   double matr[9], f, g;
02974   double loc1, loc2, loc3;
02975 
02976   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
02977   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
02978   matr[1] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][0] - x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
02979   matr[2] = x[3][0] - x[0][0];
02980   
02981   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
02982   matr[4] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][1] - x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
02983   matr[5] = x[3][1] - x[0][1];
02984   
02985   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
02986   matr[7] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][2] - x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
02987   matr[8] = x[3][2] - x[0][2];
02988 
02989   /* Calculate det(M). */
02990   loc1 = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
02991   loc2 = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
02992   loc3 = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
02993   g = matr[0]*loc1 + matr[1]*loc2 + matr[2]*loc3;
02994   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
02995 
02996   /* Calculate norm(M). */
02997   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] +
02998       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
02999       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
03000 
03001   /* Calculate objective function. */
03002   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
03003   return true;
03004 }
03005 
03006 
03007 inline bool g_fcn_3w(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[4], const Vector3D x[4],
03008          const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
03009 {
03010   double matr[9], f;
03011   double adj_m[9], g;
03012   double loc1, loc2, loc3;
03013 
03014   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
03015   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
03016   matr[1] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][0] - x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
03017   matr[2] = x[3][0] - x[0][0];
03018   
03019   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
03020   matr[4] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][1] - x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
03021   matr[5] = x[3][1] - x[0][1];
03022   
03023   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
03024   matr[7] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][2] - x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
03025   matr[8] = x[3][2] - x[0][2];
03026 
03027   /* Calculate det(M). */
03028   loc1 = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
03029   loc2 = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
03030   loc3 = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
03031   g = matr[0]*loc1 + matr[1]*loc2 + matr[2]*loc3;
03032   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
03033 
03034   /* Calculate norm(M). */
03035   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] +
03036       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
03037       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
03038 
03039   /* Calculate objective function. */
03040   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
03041 
03042   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
03043   f = b.value() * obj / f;    /* Constant on nabla f      */
03044   g = c.value() * obj / g;    /* Constant on nable g      */
03045   f *= 2.0;           /* Modification for nabla f */
03046 
03047   adj_m[0] = matr[0]*f + loc1*g;
03048   adj_m[1] = matr[1]*f + loc2*g;
03049   adj_m[2] = matr[2]*f + loc3*g;
03050 
03051   loc1 = matr[0]*g;
03052   loc2 = matr[1]*g;
03053   loc3 = matr[2]*g;
03054 
03055   adj_m[3] = matr[3]*f + loc3*matr[7] - loc2*matr[8];
03056   adj_m[4] = matr[4]*f + loc1*matr[8] - loc3*matr[6];
03057   adj_m[5] = matr[5]*f + loc2*matr[6] - loc1*matr[7];
03058 
03059   adj_m[6] = matr[6]*f + loc2*matr[5] - loc3*matr[4];
03060   adj_m[7] = matr[7]*f + loc3*matr[3] - loc1*matr[5];
03061   adj_m[8] = matr[8]*f + loc1*matr[4] - loc2*matr[3];
03062 
03063   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - isqrt3*adj_m[1] - adj_m[2];
03064   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0] - isqrt3*adj_m[1]           ;
03065   g_obj[2][0] =            tisqrt3*adj_m[1]           ;
03066   g_obj[3][0] =                               adj_m[2];
03067 
03068   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - isqrt3*adj_m[4] - adj_m[5];
03069   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3] - isqrt3*adj_m[4]           ;
03070   g_obj[2][1] =            tisqrt3*adj_m[4]           ;
03071   g_obj[3][1] =                               adj_m[5];
03072 
03073   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - isqrt3*adj_m[7] - adj_m[8];
03074   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6] - isqrt3*adj_m[7]           ;
03075   g_obj[2][2] =            tisqrt3*adj_m[7]           ;
03076   g_obj[3][2] =                               adj_m[8];
03077 
03078   return true;
03079 }
03080 
03081 
03082 inline bool h_fcn_3w(double &obj, Vector3D g_obj[4], Matrix3D h_obj[10], 
03083                      const Vector3D x[4],
03084                      const double a, const Exponent& b, const Exponent& c)
03085 {
03086   double matr[9], f;
03087   double adj_m[9], g;
03088   double dg[9], loc0, loc1, loc2, loc3, loc4;
03089   double A[12], J_A[6], J_B[9], J_C[9], cross;
03090 
03091   /* Calculate M = A*inv(W). */
03092   matr[0] = x[1][0] - x[0][0];
03093   matr[1] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][0] - x[1][0] - x[0][0]);
03094   matr[2] = x[3][0] - x[0][0];
03095   
03096   matr[3] = x[1][1] - x[0][1];
03097   matr[4] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][1] - x[1][1] - x[0][1]);
03098   matr[5] = x[3][1] - x[0][1];
03099   
03100   matr[6] = x[1][2] - x[0][2];
03101   matr[7] = isqrt3 * (2 * x[2][2] - x[1][2] - x[0][2]);
03102   matr[8] = x[3][2] - x[0][2];
03103 
03104   /* Calculate det(M). */
03105   dg[0] = matr[4]*matr[8] - matr[5]*matr[7];
03106   dg[1] = matr[5]*matr[6] - matr[3]*matr[8];
03107   dg[2] = matr[3]*matr[7] - matr[4]*matr[6];
03108   g = matr[0]*dg[0] + matr[1]*dg[1] + matr[2]*dg[2];
03109   if (g < MSQ_MIN) { obj = g; return false; }
03110 
03111   dg[3] = matr[2]*matr[7] - matr[1]*matr[8];
03112   dg[4] = matr[0]*matr[8] - matr[2]*matr[6];
03113   dg[5] = matr[1]*matr[6] - matr[0]*matr[7];
03114   dg[6] = matr[1]*matr[5] - matr[2]*matr[4];
03115   dg[7] = matr[2]*matr[3] - matr[0]*matr[5];
03116   dg[8] = matr[0]*matr[4] - matr[1]*matr[3];
03117 
03118   /* Calculate norm(M). */
03119   f = matr[0]*matr[0] + matr[1]*matr[1] + matr[2]*matr[2] + 
03120       matr[3]*matr[3] + matr[4]*matr[4] + matr[5]*matr[5] +
03121       matr[6]*matr[6] + matr[7]*matr[7] + matr[8]*matr[8];
03122 
03123   loc3 = f;
03124   loc4 = g;
03125 
03126   /* Calculate objective function. */
03127   obj  = a * b.raise(f) * c.raise(g);
03128 
03129   /* Calculate the derivative of the objective function.    */
03130   f = b.value() * obj / f;              /* Constant on nabla f      */
03131   g = c.value() * obj / g;              /* Constant on nable g      */
03132   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f */
03133 
03134   adj_m[0] = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*g;
03135   adj_m[1] = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*g;
03136   adj_m[2] = matr[2]*f + dg[2]*g;
03137   adj_m[3] = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*g;
03138   adj_m[4] = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*g;
03139   adj_m[5] = matr[5]*f + dg[5]*g;
03140   adj_m[6] = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*g;
03141   adj_m[7] = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*g;
03142   adj_m[8] = matr[8]*f + dg[8]*g;
03143 
03144   g_obj[0][0] = -adj_m[0] - isqrt3*adj_m[1] - adj_m[2];
03145   g_obj[1][0] =  adj_m[0] - isqrt3*adj_m[1]           ;
03146   g_obj[2][0] =            tisqrt3*adj_m[1]           ;
03147   g_obj[3][0] =                               adj_m[2];
03148 
03149   g_obj[0][1] = -adj_m[3] - isqrt3*adj_m[4] - adj_m[5];
03150   g_obj[1][1] =  adj_m[3] - isqrt3*adj_m[4]           ;
03151   g_obj[2][1] =            tisqrt3*adj_m[4]           ;
03152   g_obj[3][1] =                               adj_m[5];
03153 
03154   g_obj[0][2] = -adj_m[6] - isqrt3*adj_m[7] - adj_m[8];
03155   g_obj[1][2] =  adj_m[6] - isqrt3*adj_m[7]           ;
03156   g_obj[2][2] =            tisqrt3*adj_m[7]           ;
03157   g_obj[3][2] =                               adj_m[8];
03158 
03159   /* Calculate the hessian of the objective.                   */
03160   loc0 = f;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 f       */
03161   loc1 = g;                     /* Constant on nabla^2 g       */
03162   cross = f * c.value() / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla f */
03163   f = f * (b.value()-1) / loc3;         /* Constant on nabla f nabla f */
03164   g = g * (c.value()-1) / loc4;         /* Constant on nabla g nabla g */
03165   f *= 2.0;                     /* Modification for nabla f    */
03166 
03167   /* First block of rows */
03168   loc3 = matr[0]*f + dg[0]*cross;
03169   loc4 = dg[0]*g + matr[0]*cross;
03170 
03171   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[0] + loc4*dg[0];
03172   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
03173   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
03174   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
03175   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
03176   J_B[2] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
03177   J_C[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
03178   J_C[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
03179   J_C[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03180 
03181   loc3 = matr[1]*f + dg[1]*cross;
03182   loc4 = dg[1]*g + matr[1]*cross;
03183 
03184   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[1] + loc4*dg[1];
03185   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
03186   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
03187   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
03188   J_B[5] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
03189   J_C[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
03190   J_C[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
03191   J_C[5] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03192 
03193   loc3 = matr[2]*f + dg[2]*cross;
03194   loc4 = dg[2]*g + matr[2]*cross;
03195 
03196   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[2] + loc4*dg[2];
03197   J_B[6] = loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
03198   J_B[7] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
03199   J_B[8] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
03200   J_C[6] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
03201   J_C[7] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
03202   J_C[8] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03203 
03204   /* First diagonal block */
03205   A[0]  = -J_A[0] - isqrt3*J_A[1] - J_A[2];
03206   A[1]  =  J_A[0] - isqrt3*J_A[1];
03207 //A[2]  =          tisqrt3*J_A[1];
03208 //A[3]  =                           J_A[2];
03209   
03210   A[4]  = -J_A[1] - isqrt3*J_A[3] - J_A[4];
03211   A[5]  =  J_A[1] - isqrt3*J_A[3];
03212   A[6]  =          tisqrt3*J_A[3];
03213 //A[7]  =                           J_A[4];
03214 
03215   A[8]  = -J_A[2] - isqrt3*J_A[4] - J_A[5];
03216   A[9]  =  J_A[2] - isqrt3*J_A[4];
03217   A[10] =          tisqrt3*J_A[4];
03218   A[11] =                           J_A[5];
03219 
03220   h_obj[0][0][0] = -A[0] - isqrt3*A[4] - A[8];
03221   h_obj[1][0][0] =  A[0] - isqrt3*A[4];
03222   h_obj[2][0][0] =        tisqrt3*A[4];
03223   h_obj[3][0][0] =                       A[8];
03224 
03225   h_obj[4][0][0] =  A[1] - isqrt3*A[5];
03226   h_obj[5][0][0] =        tisqrt3*A[5];
03227   h_obj[6][0][0] =                       A[9];
03228   
03229   h_obj[7][0][0] =        tisqrt3*A[6];
03230   h_obj[8][0][0] =                       A[10];
03231 
03232   h_obj[9][0][0] =                       A[11];
03233 
03234   /* First off-diagonal block */
03235   loc2 = matr[8]*loc1;
03236   J_B[1] += loc2;
03237   J_B[3] -= loc2;
03238 
03239   loc2 = matr[7]*loc1;
03240   J_B[2] -= loc2;
03241   J_B[6] += loc2;
03242 
03243   loc2 = matr[6]*loc1;
03244   J_B[5] += loc2;
03245   J_B[7] -= loc2;
03246 
03247   A[0]  = -J_B[0] - isqrt3*J_B[1] - J_B[2];
03248   A[1]  =  J_B[0] - isqrt3*J_B[1];
03249   A[2]  =          tisqrt3*J_B[1];
03250   A[3]  =                           J_B[2];
03251   
03252   A[4]  = -J_B[3] - isqrt3*J_B[4] - J_B[5];
03253   A[5]  =  J_B[3] - isqrt3*J_B[4];
03254   A[6]  =          tisqrt3*J_B[4];
03255   A[7]  =                           J_B[5];
03256 
03257   A[8]  = -J_B[6] - isqrt3*J_B[7] - J_B[8];
03258   A[9]  =  J_B[6] - isqrt3*J_B[7];
03259   A[10] =          tisqrt3*J_B[7];
03260   A[11] =                           J_B[8];
03261 
03262   h_obj[0][0][1] = -A[0] - isqrt3*A[4] - A[8];
03263   h_obj[1][1][0] =  A[0] - isqrt3*A[4];
03264   h_obj[2][1][0] =        tisqrt3*A[4];
03265   h_obj[3][1][0] =                       A[8];
03266 
03267   h_obj[1][0][1] = -A[1] - isqrt3*A[5] - A[9];
03268   h_obj[4][0][1] =  A[1] - isqrt3*A[5];
03269   h_obj[5][1][0] =        tisqrt3*A[5];
03270   h_obj[6][1][0] =                       A[9];
03271 
03272   h_obj[2][0][1] = -A[2] - isqrt3*A[6] - A[10];
03273   h_obj[5][0][1] =  A[2] - isqrt3*A[6];
03274   h_obj[7][0][1] =        tisqrt3*A[6];
03275   h_obj[8][1][0] =                       A[10];
03276 
03277   h_obj[3][0][1] = -A[3] - isqrt3*A[7] - A[11];
03278   h_obj[6][0][1] =  A[3] - isqrt3*A[7];
03279   h_obj[8][0][1] =        tisqrt3*A[7];
03280   h_obj[9][0][1] =                       A[11];
03281 
03282   /* Second off-diagonal block */
03283   loc2 = matr[5]*loc1;
03284   J_C[1] -= loc2;
03285   J_C[3] += loc2;
03286 
03287   loc2 = matr[4]*loc1;
03288   J_C[2] += loc2;
03289   J_C[6] -= loc2;
03290 
03291   loc2 = matr[3]*loc1;
03292   J_C[5] -= loc2;
03293   J_C[7] += loc2;
03294 
03295   A[0]  = -J_C[0] - isqrt3*J_C[1] - J_C[2];
03296   A[1]  =  J_C[0] - isqrt3*J_C[1];
03297   A[2]  =          tisqrt3*J_C[1];
03298   A[3]  =                           J_C[2];
03299   
03300   A[4]  = -J_C[3] - isqrt3*J_C[4] - J_C[5];
03301   A[5]  =  J_C[3] - isqrt3*J_C[4];
03302   A[6]  =          tisqrt3*J_C[4];
03303   A[7]  =                           J_C[5];
03304 
03305   A[8]  = -J_C[6] - isqrt3*J_C[7] - J_C[8];
03306   A[9]  =  J_C[6] - isqrt3*J_C[7];
03307   A[10] =          tisqrt3*J_C[7];
03308   A[11] =                           J_C[8];
03309 
03310   h_obj[0][0][2] = -A[0] - isqrt3*A[4] - A[8];
03311   h_obj[1][2][0] =  A[0] - isqrt3*A[4];
03312   h_obj[2][2][0] =        tisqrt3*A[4];
03313   h_obj[3][2][0] =                       A[8];
03314 
03315   h_obj[1][0][2] = -A[1] - isqrt3*A[5] - A[9];
03316   h_obj[4][0][2] =  A[1] - isqrt3*A[5];
03317   h_obj[5][2][0] =        tisqrt3*A[5];
03318   h_obj[6][2][0] =                       A[9];
03319 
03320   h_obj[2][0][2] = -A[2] - isqrt3*A[6] - A[10];
03321   h_obj[5][0][2] =  A[2] - isqrt3*A[6];
03322   h_obj[7][0][2] =        tisqrt3*A[6];
03323   h_obj[8][2][0] =                       A[10];
03324 
03325   h_obj[3][0][2] = -A[3] - isqrt3*A[7] - A[11];
03326   h_obj[6][0][2] =  A[3] - isqrt3*A[7];
03327   h_obj[8][0][2] =        tisqrt3*A[7];
03328   h_obj[9][0][2] =                       A[11];
03329 
03330   /* Second block of rows */
03331   loc3 = matr[3]*f + dg[3]*cross;
03332   loc4 = dg[3]*g + matr[3]*cross;
03333 
03334   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[3] + loc4*dg[3];
03335   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
03336   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
03337   J_B[0] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
03338   J_B[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
03339   J_B[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03340 
03341   loc3 = matr[4]*f + dg[4]*cross;
03342   loc4 = dg[4]*g + matr[4]*cross;
03343 
03344   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[4] + loc4*dg[4];
03345   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
03346   J_B[3] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
03347   J_B[4] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
03348   J_B[5] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03349 
03350   loc3 = matr[5]*f + dg[5]*cross;
03351   loc4 = dg[5]*g + matr[5]*cross;
03352 
03353   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[5] + loc4*dg[5];
03354   J_B[6] = loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
03355   J_B[7] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
03356   J_B[8] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03357 
03358   /* Second diagonal block */
03359   A[0]  = -J_A[0] - isqrt3*J_A[1] - J_A[2];
03360   A[1]  =  J_A[0] - isqrt3*J_A[1];
03361 //A[2]  =          tisqrt3*J_A[1];
03362 //A[3]  =                           J_A[2];
03363   
03364   A[4]  = -J_A[1] - isqrt3*J_A[3] - J_A[4];
03365   A[5]  =  J_A[1] - isqrt3*J_A[3];
03366   A[6]  =          tisqrt3*J_A[3];
03367 //A[7]  =                           J_A[4];
03368 
03369   A[8]  = -J_A[2] - isqrt3*J_A[4] - J_A[5];
03370   A[9]  =  J_A[2] - isqrt3*J_A[4];
03371   A[10] =          tisqrt3*J_A[4];
03372   A[11] =                           J_A[5];
03373 
03374   h_obj[0][1][1] =  -A[0] - isqrt3*A[4] - A[8];
03375   h_obj[1][1][1] =   A[0] - isqrt3*A[4];
03376   h_obj[2][1][1] =         tisqrt3*A[4];
03377   h_obj[3][1][1] =                        A[8];
03378 
03379   h_obj[4][1][1] =   A[1] - isqrt3*A[5];
03380   h_obj[5][1][1] =         tisqrt3*A[5];
03381   h_obj[6][1][1] =                        A[9];
03382   
03383   h_obj[7][1][1] =         tisqrt3*A[6];
03384   h_obj[8][1][1] =                        A[10];
03385 
03386   h_obj[9][1][1] =                        A[11];
03387 
03388   /* Third off-diagonal block */
03389   loc2 = matr[2]*loc1;
03390   J_B[1] += loc2;
03391   J_B[3] -= loc2;
03392 
03393   loc2 = matr[1]*loc1;
03394   J_B[2] -= loc2;
03395   J_B[6] += loc2;
03396 
03397   loc2 = matr[0]*loc1;
03398   J_B[5] += loc2;
03399   J_B[7] -= loc2;
03400 
03401   A[0]  = -J_B[0] - isqrt3*J_B[1] - J_B[2];
03402   A[1]  =  J_B[0] - isqrt3*J_B[1];
03403   A[2]  =          tisqrt3*J_B[1];
03404   A[3]  =                           J_B[2];
03405   
03406   A[4]  = -J_B[3] - isqrt3*J_B[4] - J_B[5];
03407   A[5]  =  J_B[3] - isqrt3*J_B[4];
03408   A[6]  =          tisqrt3*J_B[4];
03409   A[7]  =                           J_B[5];
03410 
03411   A[8]  = -J_B[6] - isqrt3*J_B[7] - J_B[8];
03412   A[9]  =  J_B[6] - isqrt3*J_B[7];
03413   A[10] =          tisqrt3*J_B[7];
03414   A[11] =                           J_B[8];
03415 
03416   h_obj[0][1][2] = -A[0] - isqrt3*A[4] - A[8];
03417   h_obj[1][2][1] =  A[0] - isqrt3*A[4];
03418   h_obj[2][2][1] =        tisqrt3*A[4];
03419   h_obj[3][2][1] =                       A[8];
03420 
03421   h_obj[1][1][2] = -A[1] - isqrt3*A[5] - A[9];
03422   h_obj[4][1][2] =  A[1] - isqrt3*A[5];
03423   h_obj[5][2][1] =        tisqrt3*A[5];
03424   h_obj[6][2][1] =                       A[9];
03425 
03426   h_obj[2][1][2] = -A[2] - isqrt3*A[6] - A[10];
03427   h_obj[5][1][2] =  A[2] - isqrt3*A[6];
03428   h_obj[7][1][2] =        tisqrt3*A[6];
03429   h_obj[8][2][1] =                       A[10];
03430 
03431   h_obj[3][1][2] = -A[3] - isqrt3*A[7] - A[11];
03432   h_obj[6][1][2] =  A[3] - isqrt3*A[7];
03433   h_obj[8][1][2] =        tisqrt3*A[7];
03434   h_obj[9][1][2] =                       A[11];
03435 
03436   /* Third block of rows */
03437   loc3 = matr[6]*f + dg[6]*cross;
03438   loc4 = dg[6]*g + matr[6]*cross;
03439 
03440   J_A[0] = loc0 + loc3*matr[6] + loc4*dg[6];
03441   J_A[1] = loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
03442   J_A[2] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03443 
03444   loc3 = matr[7]*f + dg[7]*cross;
03445   loc4 = dg[7]*g + matr[7]*cross;
03446 
03447   J_A[3] = loc0 + loc3*matr[7] + loc4*dg[7];
03448   J_A[4] = loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03449 
03450   loc3 = matr[8]*f + dg[8]*cross;
03451   loc4 = dg[8]*g + matr[8]*cross;
03452 
03453   J_A[5] = loc0 + loc3*matr[8] + loc4*dg[8];
03454 
03455   /* Third diagonal block */
03456   A[0]  = -J_A[0] - isqrt3*J_A[1] - J_A[2];
03457   A[1]  =  J_A[0] - isqrt3*J_A[1];
03458 //A[2]  =          tisqrt3*J_A[1];
03459 //A[3]  =                           J_A[2];
03460   
03461   A[4]  = -J_A[1] - isqrt3*J_A[3] - J_A[4];
03462   A[5]  =  J_A[1] - isqrt3*J_A[3];
03463   A[6]  =          tisqrt3*J_A[3];
03464 //A[7]  =                           J_A[4];
03465 
03466   A[8]  = -J_A[2] - isqrt3*J_A[4] - J_A[5];
03467   A[9]  =  J_A[2] - isqrt3*J_A[4];
03468   A[10] =          tisqrt3*J_A[4];
03469   A[11] =                           J_A[5];
03470 
03471   h_obj[0][2][2] = -A[0] - isqrt3*A[4] - A[8];
03472   h_obj[1][2][2] =  A[0] - isqrt3*A[4];
03473   h_obj[2][2][2] =        tisqrt3*A[4];
03474   h_obj[3][2][2] =                       A[8];
03475 
03476   h_obj[4][2][2] =  A[1] - isqrt3*A[5];
03477   h_obj[5][2][2] =        tisqrt3*A[5];
03478   h_obj[6][2][2] =                       A[9];
03479   
03480   h_obj[7][2][2] =        tisqrt3*A[6];
03481   h_obj[8][2][2] =                       A[10];
03482 
03483   h_obj[9][2][2] =                       A[11];
03484 
03485   // completes diagonal blocks.
03486   h_obj[0].fill_lower_triangle();
03487   h_obj[4].fill_lower_triangle();
03488   h_obj[7].fill_lower_triangle();
03489   h_obj[9].fill_lower_triangle();
03490   
03491   return true;
03492 }
